text: We really loved staying at this hotel.  Miles helped us out and he was so amazing! He made sure we had the most perfect stay & did everything in his power to do so. Will definitely be staying here again.

title: Best hotel stay EVER!!!
text: 6 of us stayed in a suite for our niece’s 23rd birthday. It was gorgeous! Every member of the staff couldn’t have been more friendly or accommodating, especially Miles. He made sure we were well taken care of and that our experience was beyond exceptional. The house keeping staff made sure we were short of nothing and that our suite was immaculate. Maurice was one of the friendliest people I’ve ever met and we really enjoyed talking with him and learning about the hotel. The bellhops were so kind and even sang “happy birthday” to our niece when we ventured in from our night out! One of the bellhops was especially sweet to us when we had to leave; making sure that we had everything, and even giving a stuffed bear to the birthday girl. He sent us away with well wishes and smiles on our faces. This was an amazing experience and I can not wait to go back! I will always recommend this hotel for anyone wanting a memorable and luxurious experience!

title: Amazing Pre-Valentine’s Day Trip!
text: My husband/Valentine and I came to NYC to visit family and friends. Dan Nelson completely hooked us up! Beautiful corner suite with welcome cookies - so much space- and the VIEWS ARE TO DIE FOR!! Thank you, Dan, for this wonderful, luxurious, clean, and perfectly located hotel! We will definitely stay here again!

title: Wonderful experience
text: The staff was extremely helpful and friendly, the lobby/bar/building is stunning, our room was comfortable and quiet, overall had a wonderful stay and would definitely stay at the Towers at Lotte New York Palace again.

title: The best New York City experience ever!
text: I spent my 21st birthday in the towers and had the most wonderful time! This will be an experience I will never forget with welcoming staff that will accommodate all your needs and go above and beyond. If you can, try to find Samir, Maurice, Rawls and Miles. Seriously the most welcoming people I’ve ever met and truly made my birthday special. The hotel is lovely and seeing all the vibrant history where they filmed iconic shows was a dream. Stellar views and the rooms are also much bigger than other hotels in NYC. Lotte Palace is the perfect place for your next stay! Also, the area is very ideal, right in Rockefeller center so there’s lots of food and activities nearby.

title: What A Great Weekend
text: The staff were amazing! We came to celebrate my sons 16th birthday and everyone took so great care of us, from maintenance, to house keeping, concierge, security, room service, and the doormen. I can’t overstate how wonderful the staff are! The view from our room was amazing and the suite was just perfect!

title: Excellent again
text:
We have been long time customers of the hotel. After almost 4 years, due to covid we were finally able to comeback.
Our stay has been great since its start: check-in was efficient and polite. We were offered un upgrade immediately.
Room with great views and good maintenance: no complaints
Pomme-palais breakfast feels like a top european bakery: nothing to do with the typical american breakfast.
Little contact with concierge, but very helpful anyway.
We think Lotte NyPalace has an outstanding location for visitors

title: Amazing staff!
text:
We first check in with our daughter the last weekend in January. We had an amazing visit with a staff that went above and beyond. We were upgraded to the Towers. My daughter was greeted with a light up frown to wear that she wore all over NYC. The concierge called and got a reservation at a booked restaurant. Staff always greeted with a smile. I learned on the last day of our stay that I would need to travel into NYC again the following day for doctors appointments. I explained to staff Linny this was occurring and she spoke with the hotel manager. Miles who was beyond accommodating by offering myself and my mother the same rate in the exact same room!!!!! We checked in early as my appointment was an early afternoon. We did not expect our room to be ready but Linny again at the desk had us go directly to our room so we could relax a Dec hours before. Our  level is high as I will have to undergo a major surgery and this was beyond comforting. Upon checkout we met at the desk with Jimm. Upon learning I will have to book 2 nights 3 days after this check out due to surgery Jimm went above and beyond contacting hotel manager Miles and others to ensure we were in the same quiet area of the hotel at a reduced rate. We spoke for a long while and he was kind and compassionate and even texted us after we left that it was all arranged. I cried as we were treated with duck kindness, compassion and respect our two stays in 4 days. I knew I wanted to stay at the palace again as the nights sleep I had their were the best I have had in almost a month since learning my diagnosis. I know when we check in this weekend I will immediately be at ease and comfortable and will hopefully be able to sleep before my procedure. This is all because of the amazing staff who went above and beyond! The room itself is gorgeous, beyond clean and the softest linens ever! Especially loved the full size bath sheet and pillows! The view above St Patrick’s Cathedral brought me a sense of calm I haven’t  felt in weeks. 

Thank you, thank you, thank you to the amazing staff especially Jimm, Miles, Linny and Alexandra. You don’t know what this means to our family! Your kindness is immeasurable.

title: Wonderful Stay
text: I had a wonderful experience at the Lotte Palace over a 2 week stay this month. The staff was helpful and courteous, and the facility and location is superb. Miles Gomez, the front desk manager is excellent, as were the concierge. Highly recommend and will stay there again!

title: SO GLAD TO RETURN TO THE TOWERS AT LOTTE PALACE
text:
What a great feeling it was to be back among my friends at Lotte Palace Towers! I had come for 3 straight years prior to the pandemic and looked forward to each visit knowing it was going to be a great visit!  I had so looked forward to celebrating a birthday milestone at Lotte Palace in 2020 but I was forced to cancel my reservations due to the pandemic. This year I was determined to make the trip and I am so glad I did. 

My friends had made arrangements to stay at a different hotel, but once you have experienced Lotte Palace, you just can't settle for anything less. It's not just the building, it's the people who make the experience great. Lotte Palace truly has a great team!

I can always depend on Clara Law to be there to greet me with a warm smile when I arrive! If I desire anything to make my visit special, I know I can reach out to Clara and she will either handle it or reach out to the right person to ensure it is handled! That is very reassuring. On each visit I always look for a different room view or experience. On this visit I had a view that far exceeded my expectations! I had the opportunity to experience the corner suite and I absolutely loved it! I so appreciate Clara and Miles Gomez for assisting me with my room selection. They are truly an asset to the team.

I always try to remember the names of all the people who assisted me and did so with such a pleasant demeanor. I like to ensure they know that I see them and I appreciate them. Gladys was such a joy to see each day. And she ensured I had everything I needed for the room daily. I believe it was Xue who provided housekeeping service on Sunday and she too was extremely helpful and pleasant. Yohanna, Norma, Christian, Diego, Gregory, Louis, Samir, and Gary assisted me with printouts, restaurant recommendations and other needs from the front desk or luggage assistance.

And all the gentlemen at Villard were very accommodating. (I hope they forgive me for not recalling their names). I must say however, I do look forward to Melissa's return!!!

As usual, I just left, but I am already looking forward to my next visit!!! I plan to return very soon to make up for lost time!!!

title: Terrible service, spacious and comfortable room, great location
text: We stayed in an Executive Suite (2 adults, 1 teenager on the pullout sofa, which she said was not great but acceptable). Room was spacious by NY standards (foyer with coat closet, living room with sofa, table/chairs/tv console, large bedroom, walk-in closet, large bathroom with dual sinks, shower, independent tub. Style is very traditional and not particularly new or luxe feeling but still quite nice and clean.  View was lovely (windows are wide but not tall).  My biggest issues are that the Towers elevators are small, slow and always involve waiting and that the service at check in was terrible. We waited for 45 minutes to check in (only 1 person on duty at 5:30pm), the concierge refused to help anyone waiting and just stood around rolling his eyes at frustrated guests, there were 2 families that had been waiting all day for their rooms (even after the 4pm check in time), one family had checked in only to find someone else in their assigned room.  The mood in the lobby for the towers was angry and unpleasant.  I have no idea what the regular part of the hotel is like, but they certainly have larger elevator banks and a lot more people on duty at check in.  The breakfast is lovely but pricey, even for NY. One day my breakfast took forever (the other people in our party were done when mine arrived) and then arrived burned to the point of being inedible and they consequently comp'd my meal (and replaced the burned breakfast). But at the price they charge, those kinds of things shouldn't happen in the first place.  Overall, this is not even close to being the creme de la creme of 5 star hotels in NY and definitely not the best we've stayed in (see my other reviews), but it has going for it a great location and spacious rooms.  It was awfully expensive for what it was and I am not likely to go back.  On a funny note, I stayed here the first time 20 years ago in the same room and the rate was 5 times was it was then. That's NY for ya.

title: Wonderful Stay
text: We decided to make a January trip to the city since it was so crowded when we were there in December.  We've previously stayed in The Towers but this visit exceeded our expectations.  Miles went above and beyond to take care of us.  He could not have been any nicer, more professional or done anything else to make our stay any better.  He is wonderful!!

title: Private Gossip girl tour
text:
We went to the Lotte New York palace hotel as it’s the set of the 1st season of Gossip Girl, and the doorman Maurice gave us a great tour of the grounds, showing us all the spots where they shot the series. It’s a gorgeous hotel with wonderful staff - no wonder Gossip girl picked it!

Thanks Maurice, you made my day!

title: Hightly recommend this hotel & loved the service, especially the doorman, Ray!
text:
I cannot say enough wonderful things about our girls weekend at this hotel! The location was absolutely perfect for shopping on 5th Avenue, visiting Rockefeller center and seeing Broadway shows! The hotel itself is exquisite and the rooms on the tower side were large with glorious views. I have to say that Ray the doorman was a highlight to our stay! He was always friendly, remembered us and even sang to us! 
He is a hardworking and kind person who made "The Who Dats" feel right at home!

title: Excellent property
text: From the moment you arrive, the staff treat you like royalty. Everyone took a genuine interest in making our stay amazing. Becky, the general manager made a point of meeting us and  made our stay extra special. I always recommend this hotel to our friends.

title: A great place to be in NYC
text: Just returned from a 4 day trip to NY- last minute reservations for 6 people. The staff was friendly and accommodating. The facilities are clean and very well maintained. The concierge Christian was wonderful  and helpful. The reception/ checkout was easy and a few discrepancies corrected easily. Lincy was so pleasant and helpful.

title: Christmas and New Years at Lotte Towers
text:
We booked very last minute to stay at the Lotte Towers from Christmas 2022 until the new year in 2023. The team went out of their way to prepare the suite, decorate it with festive decorations, a Christmas tree and flowers and made sure everything was in order, even though it was last minute. 

Our stay was perfect, with the whole Lotte team accommodating and going out of their way to make sure everything was pristine. All requests were promptly dealt with and any questions or issues addressed. I'd especially like to thank Martin, Samir and Miles who went over and above what was expected. 

We all had such a memorable time and a great time at the hotel, enjoying the suite and the views especially from the terrace at New Year's Eve.

title: Amazing Xmas Stay
text: Another great stay at the Lotte Towers. The hotel was beautifully decorated for Christmas. Clara was especially helpful as usual, helping us to secure seats for drinks in the Gold Room and coordinating dinner reservations with the concierge while we were out. I would like to thank Miles, Michael, and Clara for their excellent service throughout our stay. We can’t wait to come back.

title: Better Than Home
text: The Towers at Lotte New York Palace are literally better than your actual home. We originally planned on staying 4 nights between Christmas and New Years, but ended up staying 2 extra nights and everyone we encountered was so professional, accommodating, and informative. In particular Samir went out of his way numerous times to not only speak to us when he saw us, but also ask if there was anything else we needed, show us around, and provide extra information. A top choice to stay in Manhattan.

title: Great hotel, great location, super busy restaurant
text: Incredibly beautiful hotel, very clean, rooms very quiet and in great condition, gorgeous hotel with great history… only downfall was restaurant too small for size of hotel- expensive and long waits..room was excellent and very quiet

title: Christmas stay 2022
text: We recently came to the Lotte Plaza Hotel the week after Christmas and it is truly a five star hotel! The courtyard and lobby are beautifully decorated for the holidays and the staff is warm and inviting. The manager Miles is extremely helpful and went above and beyond to make our engagement trip one to remember. The cathedral skyline view room is everything it is advertised to be and more! We will only being staying at the Lotte plaza hotel for every future trip to come!

title: Engagement Stay
text: Our stay at the Lotte hotel has been absolutely amazing. The hotel itself is so gorgeous and they did such a great job of decorating it for Christmas. Our room was very spacious, and our view was incredible. Highly suggest the cathedral skyline view! All of the staff is extremely kind and helpful, especially the assistant manager, Miles! He went above and beyond to make our stay such a wonderful experience. We got engaged on our trip, and he made us feel so incredibly special. I highly suggest staying at this hotel, and reaching out to Miles if you need help with anything!

title: Almost perfect
text:
The Lotte is a beautiful hotel in a great area within walking distance to the Rockefeller centre and numerous other attractions.

Check in and check out, was quite lengthy with only two members of staff present during peak periods. 

Isabella and Lincy at the concierge desk were excellent. Very cheerful and helpful, a real credit to the hotel.

Facilities overall very good though prices for some items were very expensive though this wouldn’t prevent me from returning.

Small things such as robes and tea/coffee facilities in room would have been nice and I suppose expected for the standard and price paid. 

All in all a great stay.

title: Wonderful views, terrible service and amenities
text:
Our family chose the Lotte New York Palace for our pre Christmas visit to the city. The western views from our 54th floor room overlooking St. Patrick’s Cathedral, Madison Ave., and Rockefellar Center were breathtaking and the service at the door with the bell staff was wonderful. Unfortunately, in looking back at our time there, we really couldn’t point at much else that would justify the 5 star pricing and reputation.
 
Many basic amenities you receive at other luxury properties were gated behind either having to be “requested” each time or being eliminated due to Covid, including any basic in room coffee service, daily complementary water, or mini bar. Turn down service was not offered, we had five people staying in our suite so we would have to utilize a couch pull out. When our request for housekeeping to help us make that bed was honored, the housekeeper angrily told us that she would not be pulling out a couch and we would need to do that. Washclothes were never replaced, basic tidying that you receive at other 5 star resorts such as curling iron cords wrapped, toothbrushes on washcloths, just never happened in our stay. We did request at the front desk for complementary waters, we never received them, but they were very quick to send up 6 when you pay $100 to room service.
 
There are too many luxury options in NYC for us to consider staying here again, despite the convenient location and the views. At the end of the day, rude front desk/housekeeping staff and having to request any basic feature just isn’t worth it.

title: Soren is the best!
text: Soren was an absolute pleasure. It was a mad house leaving on the Sunday before Christmas and he was not only organized and friendly, but he remembered everyone’s names and/or luggage even without the tags. That’s white glove service. The hotel was also a dream. We’ll be back!

title: Incredible hotel, rooms, and service
text:
This was hands down one of the best hotel experiences we have ever had in our lives. 

Check-in was smooth, with Lincy at the front desk being very helpful, kind, and attentive. We were also fortunate to get a very nice upgrade on our room. 

One of the doormen, Eddie, was also helpful and friendly our entire stay.

The rooms were wonderful, beds extremely comfortable, and housekeeping spot on. In-room breakfast was great every day. 

I will definitely stay here next time I’m in NYC. Not sure anything else could compare.

title: Excellent service and accommodation
text: We booked a cathedral view and got upgraded to a the 48th fl to see the tip of the Rockefeller tree. Every staff member was fantastic and helpful. Room had bidet and lots of space, but bed wasn’t the most comfortable. It seemed a bit older and you could feel the springs. My daughter celebrated her birthday and they brought a tiny cake and some macaroons. She was ecstatic. Lights and blinds were controlled by a pad so you could go to bed at the touch of a button. The bath towels were extra large, which we appreciated as larger people. We dined at the in house restaurant for breakfast with a reservation (required). It was good but a big pricy for what we got. Make sure to bring some smart casual clothing if you don’t want to feel out of place there. Valet parking was extremely easy and bell hops were very helpful. They also gave our kids a stuffed bear each, which they love! We were all sad to leave the amazing hotel and will stay there again for any future trips to NYC.

title: Another Successful Trip Courtesy of Miles Gomez & The Lotte NY Palace
text: Last minute, I decided to continue an annual tradition of visiting New York around Christmas time. In the past, I've turned to Miles Gomez, front office manager at The Lotte NY Palace for assistance. And as he's always done, Miles came through for me. Not only did he secure a room with a shorter (than the required minimum) stay, he generously upgraded us without an added expense. I met Miles years ago when he started as an ambassador at The Palace. He's always been and continues to be a genuinely great person and tremendous asset to an already amazing hotel. Happy Holiday! Carey

title: Keep coming back
text: This is my top choice hotel when in the city for a Broadway show. I have stayed on both sides of the hotel (hotel and towers side). Hands down after staying at the hotel part of the palace one time I specifically request the towers.  The towers is a five star experience. Yes the rooms are a little dated but the cathedral views, the service from front desk to in room dining, the massive amount of space in the rooms can’t compare to the other side of the hotel.  You are centrally located to shopping, restaurants, Rockefeller center and short walk straight down to Broadway. What else can you ask for? This is why I keep coming back.

title: They treat me like a Queen
text: John and I ONLY stay at the Palace.  The rooms, the staff and the service are all spectacular!  They really make you feel special here and go out of their way to service their every need! I had the eggs Benedict for breakfast and I can honestly say that it was the best I've ever had! Even better than the Ritz Carlton hotels!  The Lotte Palace will always be our home away from home in NYC

title: Awesome
text:
The staff was unbelievable..
The bed linens perfect. The towels perfect.  But no coffee maker ? 🤨
We asked for late check out and it wasn’t a problem. Thank you 
Michael Frick our Guest Service Agent treated us to an upgrade as I was celebrating a big birthday 
He was lovely. Thank you Michael

title: Festive Christmas stay at the Towers
text:
We had another fabulous stay at our favorite hotel, thanks to the wonderful and hard-working team of Clara, Miles and Michael.  We needed a suite to babysit our grandkids while my son and daughter-in-law had a holiday work event in town, and despite it being high season in December in New York City, Miles and Michael were able to come up with a Towers suite without a minimum stay as we were only there for Saturday night.  Early check-in has always been a priority for us as the baby needs her naps, fortunately, the guest at this suite the night before left early, so we were able to check in early which was a tremendous help.  In fact, Clara texted me at 7 am the day of arrival to let me the room was ready.  This is truly above and beyond her duties as her workday starts at 9 am!  When we arrived, Michael was expecting us and readily checked us in.  I had also arranged with Clara ahead of time for a refrigerator for the milk, a crib, a roll-away, coffee machine, and they were all delivered promptly.  She even gave us chocolates as a welcome gift.  I would like to give a special shout-out to Kan in Housekeeping, he brought the crib and roll-away and returned with sheets and extra slippers, bottled water, a cute Lotte bear for the kids, etc. and was most professional and courteous.  It was our first time to have the pleasure of meeting him, and I hope to see him again in future stays.  Clara took great care of us too while there, she gave me advice for a luncheon place that opened since our last visit, and brought paper plates, cups etc. on her own, which shows her level of attentiveness.
The courtyard is finally open with their iconic Christmas tree, and the holiday decorations throughout the hotel were festive and beautiful.  We even had pictures taken with the Rockettes at the hotel the morning we arrived.  The view from the suite was as gorgeous as ever, but this time we were able to see the famous Rockefella Christmas tree from our window which made it even more special! 
We had a most wonderful weekend to kick off the holidays.  Thank you again Lotte for your amazing staff.

title: Wonderful holiday stay at the Towers
text: My wife and I had the opportunity to return to NYC in early December and we were fortunate to get a suite in the Towers of the Lotte Hotel.  It was high season but somehow Miles and Michael were able to secure a beautiful suite for us, thanks to them they even gave us early check-in so we could avoid city traffic by starting our drive from Boston early, knowing the suite would be ready for us upon arrival.  As usual Clara was attentive to our needs and provided everything we needed without our even asking.  She worked with Kan from housekeeping to bring us extra bedding and other supplies.  it was a pleasure to interact with them.  The hotel was beautifully decorated for the holidays.  One bonus was that the location was perfect for my wife’s Christmas shopping!

title: Memorable Experience for a Family / Friends Trip!
text:
I rarely write reviews, but the Towers at the Palace really exceeded my expectations. First, I called to ask if it was possible to get an early check in. The front desk said it was, BUT then they put the manager, Miles, on the phone to discuss approximate arrival time so he can have something special ready.

I guess they knew we were traveling with kids because they had teddy bears and candy canes ready at checkin. My key card wasn’t working on my door and after a couple tries to reset, Miles personally came up to diagnose the problem. He checked in on us several times during our stay and knew our party.

The service staff was also incredible from housekeeping to room service to the bellman to the other hosts. Very attentive and efficient - especially given the very busy time of year.

The hotel also had a special Santa letter program whereby if they kids dropped a letter into the lobby mailbox, and they received a special note and gift back from Santa. Special events were planned during our stay including a visit from the rockettes. Overall, the Towers was a big part of giving 5 young children a magical stay in the city. Location is also central for all the touristy destinations.

As a side note - I normally stay at the regular part of the palace for work, which is a different, more professional experience. Nonetheless, location is central, rooms are very large and beds are comfortable.

title: GM Becky was so helpful
text: Wow! I am so thrilled to write that I enjoyed my stay at The Towers at the Lotte New York Palace and the staff was able to enhance my stay and make it memorable. We look forward to their welcoming me back upon my return.

title: Amazing! Can’t wait to return!
text: The hotel is amazing. The hotel was beautifully decorated for the holidays and the room was spacious, very clean clean and luxurious. Everyone at the hotel went above and beyond to accommodate us and provide us with the best experience, especially the front office manager Miles and the reception representative Denise. They are incredible and make our trip so special. We can’t wait to come back again !

title: Still the best hotel in New York
text:
Been coming to the Palace for 30 years both for business and pleasure. Hotel is still phenomenal. 
Updated spa and workout facility was fantastic 
Michael Frick, guest service agent is a true professional. So helpful, knowledgeable and courteous. 
Hats off to Matt, one of the bellmen. Very helpful. Finally, Maurice with security is always great. Glad to see them all and look forward to my next trip

title: Macy's day parade
text:
Have family decided to spend thanksgiving in New York City to watch the Macy's day parade without kids. The hotel is perfectly located across from St. Patrick's cathedral and Rockefeller plaza and a short walk to the parade route.

We stayed in the towers and we're offered and upgrade but a hotel stuff over this busy weekend which we were very grateful for providing for more space for our family during our time in New York City. The hotel is family and pet friendly, with lots of amenities in the hotel and in the neighborhoods surrounding and we thoroughly recommended the hotel, the staff and the location to anyone considering making this trip.

Thank you to the whole team for making our trip a huge success and a wonderful memory for our kids. I love it

title: Outstanding Customer Service
text: The staff at the Lotte Palace Hotel is outstanding and goes above and beyond for its guests. Miles (Manager) greatly helped me out today, as I was in a pinch, and was as nice as could be. The hotel itself is beautiful and in a great location for both work and travel, situated in the heart of midtown. Well kept, clean and comfortable - I will definitely be back!

title: One of the best hotels in NY
text: We came to this hotel almost every year for the last 20 years and we will keep our tradition for the next years . The staff of the hotel is very nice and always ready to help . I want to highlight the service of Melody Balcos and Miles Gomez that are making our experience in this hotel the best of all years . Definitely is the hotel that I recommend always to all the people who ask us

title: Incredible stay for our family of 5
text: Our family enjoyed an amazing stay at the incredible Lotte New York Palace. It was beautifully decorated for Christmas and one of the highlights of our family’s recent trip to NYC. The front office manager, Mr. Miles Gomez, was especially kind and welcoming. He and his hospitable staff made our daughter’s 18th birthday incredibly special. 🤍 The whole Lotte team was friendly and helpful. Our room was beautiful, comfortable, and impeccably clean. And the dining was five-star delicious! We highly recommend this hotel and plan on returning. Thank you Lotte New York Palace for a magical stay!

title: Excellent hotel
text: Beautiful staff. Excellent and courteous staff member Clara. Clean rooms and excellent breakfast. The location is very convenient. Four (4) blocks from Radio City Music Hall. If you travel to New York City stay at the Palace.

title: The Prime NY Hotel Experience!
text:
First of all, the location is perfect for a visit to Manhattan. Secondly, the facility is beautiful. We had a fabulous room, and the food in the Golden Bar was delicious. 
The service was really superior. A major call out to Michael Frick, the Guest Service Agent. He made every effort to exceed our expectations. He upgraded our room and pointed out the great aspects of the hotel. 
There are only 3 suggestions I would make:
1. If you stay in The Towers, leave yourself time for elevators—there are only 2 and the wait can be over 10 minutes. 
2. The coffee is weak. Don’t spend the money as there are so many options right around the hotel. 
3. In our specific room, the wireless internet was completely unreliable and even though we asked about it several times, the hotel really did nothing. If you need wireless for work, forget about it. Either go to the lobby or elsewhere. 
We come to NYC quite often and the Lotte has now propelled to the top of our list!

title: Outstanding Concierge staff at Lotte New York Palace Hotel
text: The Concierge staff at the Lotte New York Palace Hotel is outstanding! They are extremely responsive, organized, helpful, and personable permitting us to plan our stay with ease and confidence. Highly professional!

title: The BEST. Thank you to the NY Palace!
text: I can’t say enough about our experience. We stayed at the Towers and were fortunate to have a large suite that accommodated our family and kids. The Hotel is beautiful. The Staff and Concierge is wonderful. The location is THE BEST in NYC. I’d highly recommend the New York Palace. 5 Stars all the way!!

title: Wonderful Engagement Experience!
text:
I proposed to my fiancé at the Lotte New York Palace and had a wonderful experience! It was a very romantic backdrop with the raw beauty of the old Villard House (the historical palace upon which the hotel is built) paired with numerous festive Christmas decorations.  The location of the hotel can't be beat in the middle of Midtown NYC right next to St. Patrick's Cathedral. 

The staff and management were very accommodative and supportive of the engagement including helping us get some private moments in the beautiful rooms and even providing complimentary champagne! The Front Office Manager, Miles Gomez, arranged the whole setup, gave me a private tour and helped me surprise my fiancé with the big question. I'm very thankful for his help and know guests are in great hands with him in charge. 

We had celebratory drinks in the Palace's opulent Gold Room afterwards. 

Overall, I highly recommend the hotel based on the quality of its service, great location the irreplaceable beauty of various rooms.

title: Great location and service!!
text:
Hotel with great service at best location including fantastic views from the rooms.
Lovely big rooms with great beds, only downside was the shower in the bathroom that was a bit outdated. 
Clean and well maintained hotel overall.

title: XOXO, Maurice (gossip girl tour guide)
text: Maurice is part 2000s historian, part grandpa and part Miracle on 34th street Santa! His Gossip Girl bts tour is perfect, funny and fun! He made my fan-girl daughter’s dreams come true and the pics we got were amazing. He even threw in a few fun stories about other celeb visits to the hotel. I can’t say enough about this lovely man, the hotel and the rest of the staff that all did their best to make this trip memorable for us!

title: Gossip Girl Quinceanera
text: We met Maurice, the most amazing tour guide on a recent visit.  He has been featured in the New York Times. He’s an New York Icon! My granddaughter loves Gossip Girl and we planned a Gossip Girl quince. Maurice gave us a phenomenal behind the scenes tour of this beautiful hotel. All the staff are so warm and welcoming. They treat their guest like family.  A trip to NYC wouldn’t be complete without a trip to this beautiful hotel.

title: Incredible experience, incredible staff (thank you for everything, Clara!)
text: Beautiful room, incredible people, great location! Clara did everything possible to make sure our stay was a wonderful experience.  The views from our room were exceptional and we definitely plan to stay here next time we visit NYC.

title: Front Desk Service from Michael Frick Spectacular
text:
Location is great. Room was in good order but wanted to make a change to a suite in the Palace and Michael Frick made it happen in the span of 15 minutes (via phone from room) where he coordinated the upgrade AND the move of all our bags and closeted items such that when we returned from a matinee and dinner all we had to do was get a new key at the front desk and walk into our suite with a terrific view over St. Patrick’s.  So easy, efficient and pleasant.

Thank you!

title: Good but not exceptional
text: Only two elevators to the Tower rooms with frequently longer-than-anticipated waits. Room was dated (albeit spacious and with lovely views of St. Patrick's Cathedral). Bathroom was only average without a separate tub. Our shower head was broken when we arrived (although this was addressed quickly by the staff when mentioned). Bed was not comfortable. We generally prefer to have the option to make coffee in our room. On our two most recent trips to NYC prior to this one we stayed at two other 5-star properties - The Langham and The Mandarin Oriental. Unfortunately our recent experience at The Towers at Lotte New York Palace did not compare favorably. We were also disappointed after having a lovely experience at the Lotte property in Seattle a few months ago. In my opinion, a 5-star hotel should be outstanding and our room at The Towers at Lotte New York Palace was just mediocre. I will say that the front desk staff was very friendly and helpful but excellent service can't make up for everything.

title: Amazing stay at Lotte NY Palace
text: I recently stayed for my bachelorette weekend and I had the most amazing stay. When you walk in you are immediately hit with the beauty and great customer service. Samir was wonderful for our entire stay. He always had a smile on and was so helpful whenever we had questions for him, he went above and beyond. The views from the room are just unmatched, spacious room, huge bath, comfortable bed… overall I just can’t wait to stay again!!

title: Weekend at the Lotte
text:
Loved staying at the Lotte Palace. The rooms were extremely comfortable, it is in a very walkable location and the staff is extremely helpful and friendly.

We also enjoyed having a drink at the Gold bar in the hotel lobby, which had great drinks and bites.

title: Amazing palace  stay in Manhattan
text:
A palace hotel with a beautiful view.. the hotel is stunning with lovely decor. We had booked the  family room and it was too small and thankfully the manager Eric totally rescued us and upgraded us to the family room in the towers. A much larger room with a beautiful cathedral view. My mum loved it as we were there celebrating her bday. Pls Request a mini fridge to put ur drinks etc. there is no mini bar. 
We also got out tea compliments again thank you to Eric and Miles. 
Seriously without these 2 the hotel will not run. Eric and Miles were always helpful and made sure everything was perfect for us. Some of the other staff are rude, and not helpful. Pls speak to someone else is this happens. 
There is a Starbucks near by and convenience store. Overall we loved our stay. Thank you so so much

title: Visit
text: Miss Janet ankomah the room attendant made our stay extra pleasant. She brought a smile everyday that radiated lots of positivity, she was very helpful, kind, did her job with perfection. We look forward to seeing her during our future stay! Excellent service by miss Janet

title: The Nicest Lady in New York
text:
I arrived in Manhattan early this morning after taking the red eye from San Francisco.  I'd had 2 hours sleep on the flight, followed by a grueling drive into the city.   Lincy at the Towers let me into my room, although I'm staying in the more "modest" (all things being relative) section, instead of sending me into the mean streets.  G-d bless her!
I've stayed here many times, and have always loved it for the excellent service and incomparable location (if you want theater & shopping, anyway!), but I just reached an entirely new level of appreciation.

title: Our Wedding at The Palace  with Adam Riegler!!
text: We just had our wedding at the Palace and it was the most incredible weekend/day of our lives. We worked with Adam Riegler who was such a joy and pleasure to collaborate with. He truly went above and beyond for us to make our wedding unforgettable, and you can tell he loves what he does and really cares about the couples he works with. He even upgraded the bridal suite for us to one of the hotel’s top suites, which enhanced every aspect of the weekend. The event spaces are stunning, the entire staff was flawless, and the food was the best we’ve ever had at a wedding (a sentiment echoed by our guests). We recommend the Palace for a wedding without hesitation. They were flexible, accommodating, and no detail was overlooked. We will truly miss working with Adam, and can’t wait until our next visit/event!

title: Miles made our trip
text: Miles made this trip the most special experience in ne world. I’ve been to New York probably almost 100 of times at this point and this was the BEST because of him. He noticed it was my birthday and went out of his way to make sure we had champagne and an upgraded room our second night. He’s such a special person and knows how to deliver world class hospitality. Can’t recommend enough, make sure to ask for him!!!

title: Why The Lotte Palace Hotel remains our favorite.
text:
We have stayed at The Lotte Palace many times, but I’m moved to write a review on this one. Yes, our room was lovely, yes, the service was again gracious and hospitable, and yes it was as well located as always. The reason for this review, is that for the first time, I was frustrated over a single experience that had just gone wrong. Instead of just holding on to my frustration, I explained the situation the the front desk. The lovely woman on duty listened kindly and immediately took my input to the Front Desk Manager, Miles Gomez, who came from his office within moments. Not only did he listen, he made what was wrong absolutely right and gifted us with a lovely bottle of champagne. 
And that, Dear Reader, is what makes The Palace Hotel yet again, our Happy Home in New York.
Thank you Miles and your staff are top notch.

title: Wonderful location and very friendly staff.
text: The hotel is very very nice.  The staff is very friendly and helpful, especially Clara who helped me find restaurants and things to do. The location is incredible. Our room was right in front of St Patrick Cathedral and NBC studios. Grand Central station is .5 miles away.  Best location ever.

title: Memorable stay
text: My wife and I came in for her birthday and everyone at the Lotte wished her happy birthday every time they saw her and it added to the experience. The front office manager, Miles Gomez gave us a private tour of the hotel upon our arrival. 10/10!!

title: Top service as always
text: As always the hotel was clean and efficient, with daily and thorough housekeeping. The staff was friendly and welcome, and very helpful when we had a problem - Miles at front desk especially, he went above and beyond! Even when there was disruption caused by a large event, we get valued and assisted.

title: Where is the superior customer service everyone is experiencing?
text: I am writing this review and it’s only the first day of our trip. Sadly, I am so disappointed with our experience that I’m wondering where is the superb customer service everyone is raving about? As we arrived, the bellman greeted us and proceeded to stand next to me and watched as I unloaded luggage from the trunk of the car. He didn’t offer to help. So I hauled all of our luggage in. I noticed another guest wrote in his review that he had the same experience. Upon check-in the hotel was busy and crowded, so I suppose our concierge person was disgruntled. She was not friendly and when we inquired about upgrading our room she brashly said, “why? Your room is big enough?” Even the concierge gentlemen next to her gave us an apologetic look. I wish the customer service could have made up for the room issues. The bathtub doesn’t drain well. I had to turn the water off 3x during my shower and wait for the water that was up to my ankles to drain. I called concierge and guest services and someone answered “telecommunications” and asked me to call back in 10 mins?! What is this hotel? I am so confused with this service after reading all of the praising reviews and from the Lotte hotel brand. We’ve stayed at the Lotte in Seoul and had amazing service. There are so many hotels to choose from in the city. I would not recommend this one.

title: Amazing Experience
text: My family and I are regular visitors to NYC and by far, this is the best hotel in the whole city. The hotel is beautiful and extremely well kept. All the staff goes above and beyond to make sure your stay is exceptional. Jimm, in the towers reception area, is the nicest and most caring gentleman. He always takes care of my family and makes sure our room is perfect, and our needs are met. Marty, the manager for the hotel, always greets us upon arrival and checks in to make sure everything is going smoothly. It is always a wonderful added touch when the management cares about their guests. I can’t say enough good things about this hotel. We are actually going back in November and December. I can’t wait!!!

title: Superior Customer Service
text: During a stay this month on business, I had an extremely positive set of encounters with the outstanding staff at the Lotte Palace. Especially notable was Front Desk manager Miles Gomez, who moved swiftly at a time when hotel occupancy was at full capacity to focus on my particular issue and make me feel truly valued as a hotel patron. Similarly, Clara Law and Denise at the Front desk, as well as John from the engineering staff and Syed (please forgive the spelling!) from housekeeping/room service also all went out of their way to be pleasant and obliging. There were others who provided unflagging friendly attention and care for those staying at the Palace at this exceptionally busy time. Thanks to all of them, and I hope the hotel management will continue to cultivate this level of exceptional service.

title: Classiest Hotel in NYC
text: Lotte New York Palace is a historic gem in NYC.  The lobby and the restaurants are worthwhile to visit, even if you aren't staying there.  If you have the opportunity to stay, jump on the chance.  It is well worth it.  We stayed in the upper floors of the Tower and the views of NYC are magnificent.  the room was spacious enough for my family of 4, and it had all high-end items inside. The gym and spa are as nice as any other Hotel in NYC. Be sure to have a drink or meal in the Gold Room.  It is well worth it!!

title: Best Hotel Stay Yet
text: My husband and I have been to NY multiple times, but this was our first time staying at The Palace, and it did not disappoint! We both agreed we do not ever want to stay anywhere else. The best part was the wonderful staff. If you stay you have to do a tour with Maurice and get a drink at the bar from Jose. Both were so knowledge and enhanced the experience. Thanks for a great weekend!

title: Amazing 50th Birthday/Girls trip with 13 ladies at the Towers - HIGHLY RECOMMEND
text:
I don't know that I have enough words to describe how amazing our trip to Lotte NYC Towers was this past weekend!  I called multiple times during the weeks leading up to the weekend to discuss various details since this was my 50th birthday trip and 13 ladies were coming for the event.  Prior to arriving I was given assistance booking cars, dinners, and a rooftop bar by one of the managers, Miles Gomez, and Ani, at the concierge desk. 

We arrived Thursday, Sept 1st to the assistant manager, Mr. Miles Gomez, meeting us at the door and greeting me by name!  He brought us to check in where we were treated to a few fun gifts and then helped us to our Corner suite on the 47th floor.  

The room and the views were STUNNING!  The living room furniture looked fresh with a very large couch that also had 2 single pull out beds. The bathroom was very large with 2 sinks and a nice bag of individually boxed toiletries with a tub and separate shower.  The king bedroom is HUGE with a table & chairs as well as a dresser, large closet with 2 plush robes and slippers.  Every inch of the suite was spotless.  Our housekeeper made the suite look like we were just walking in every single day - and that was difficult with 5 ladies spread out in bathrooms/bedrooms.

The living space also included a small kitchen area with a sink, wine cooler, and an amazing serving area where we were able to set up for a party.  We had wine/alcohol delivered and the staff brought it to the room for us.  We used Charcuterie NYC for the board pictured here, and they delivered!  Highly recommend them.

Every time we walked into the lobby, the doormen sang happy birthday to me or yelled out there's the birthday girl.  Miles found us every day and asked how he could help or checked to see if we needed anything.   Every person on our trip said they have never been treated so well in a hotel.  I agree.  

I travel 70-80 nights per year for work.  I have stayed at 6 or 7 places in Manhattan prior to this weekend. I had never stayed at the Towers at Lotte before this trip -  now I will never stay anywhere else when visiting NYC.

Special thanks to Miles Gomez, Ani, and Maurice for the personal, professional, and impeccable service.  We will be back because of you.

title: Eduardo deserves the title of this review as efficient and friendly
text: I would like to start this review complementing one of the employees Eduardo. He went above and beyond to meet my needs. He seemed very experienced and provided great costumer service to me and my wife. I saw him in the hallway and he was busy but he stopped everything he was doing in order to attend to my needs. Very professional. The towers need more people like him to deal with the guests. The hotel is in a great location, close to everything. I will return!

title: The Towers at Lotte New York Palace, a beautiful oasis in NYC!!
text: Our stay at The Towers was absolutely wonderful, extremely relaxing and we truly felt pampered!  From the excellent service, the attention to detail and the incredible staff...we enjoyed our stay and will definitely return!  The concierge and front staff were there to assist us with all our questions. The view from our room was stunning!

title: NYC luxury retreat
text: Excellent location in Midtown Manhattan. Great amenities, superior service, outstanding food, fantastic spa and fitness center. Nearby to many great restaurants, shopping, Central Park sightseeing. Everything great about New York City.

title: The Best Manhattan Hotel
text:
The best hotel in the whole of Manhattan, and you can tell by the people you bump into on the elevator; the worlds finest tennis players. 

Ignoring the media circus around this time at the end of August, the staff are super-friendly and attentive. Thoroughly awesome service (excuse the tennis pun)  and while not the first time I’ve been here it certainly won’t  the last.

title: Un endroit mythique
text:
belle chambre au 49 eme étage avec une vue magnifique sur les buildings de NEW YORK. le cadre est magnifique et l hôtel est calme.

text: Maurice took us on a lovely secret tour of places where the popular TV show, Gossip Girl was filmed! The rest of the hotel is beautiful, the services are splendid. The fitness center may be the best fitness center I’ve ever seen in a hotel!

title: Couldn’t be happier
text:
Such a great hotel! Beautiful comfortable room, Very helpful staff (especially Michael from Food and Beverage who hooked us up with a memorable Room service meal, and even a birthday mousse cake for my daughter!). This will be my family’s place to stay in NYC from here on out. Kinda helps that it’s walking distance from Broadway. (Unrelated to the Lotte, but also highly recommend Wicked!)

Also, the shower has Perfect water pressure.

title: Great service!
text:
A quick weekend trip to NYC… the hotel was lovely but the service was EXCELLENT from the moment we arrived!
Clara is a true example of what customer service is. She made great suggestions for breakfast, assisted with directions and always made sure we had everything we needed. Nana and Omar  are an excellent wealth of information and provided amazing service as well! 
Thank you for all you do 😊

title: Best Anniversary at our Favorite hotel!
text:
We celebrated our 40th anniversary at the Towers at the Lotte New York Palace. 
Becky did an incredible job of making sure we had a special room with an incredible view and champagne to celebrate. Thank you Becky! 
We would like to thank Melody for such a heartfelt welcome at check in, Clara for her anniversary wishes every time she saw us, Alfred for making sure our requests were met quickly, Edmark for helping us get a cab quickly when it was raining, and housekeeping for keeping our room so nice. 
We highly recommend this beautiful hotel. So glad we found it 14 years ago as we will never stay anywhere else in New York city!

title: OUR Home away from Home!
text: Marie and Miles provided top shelf superior service to my family during a stay in August .The service and great care and attention to detail is greatly appreciated  They both truly exemplify that the Lotte palace Hotel is our Home away from home when in NYC! There is just no other place that does it better in my opinion with the level of care and concern .Thank you for your wonderful service as always which makes our trips to NYC even more special.

title: Perfect hotel for the gossip girl fan
text:
First time visiting New York couldn’t have gone better. Stayed at the Palace for obvious reasons, made even better by the oh so lovely Maurice who happened to catch my family and I on our way out for the day (and when I say catch us on our way out… I had walked off into the main courtyard with my sister behind me and he happened to be talking to my mum as we were all walking outside) on our first day to acknowledge that my sister and I looked like gossip girl fans (based on our outfits!) and kindly offered us a tour of our hotel whenever we wanted to show us all the filming locations from the show! 

Prior to booking our stay at the hotel I had no idea that this tour was available till Maurice had mentioned it to us. We ended up picking to do the hotel tour on the last day and had the very exciting opportunity to see almost everywhere except for Serena’s appartment (which Maurice had mentioned was currently occupied but had it not been, he gave his word he would have taken us up there to show us if he could have! And I truly believe him) 

The hotel itself is absolutely beautiful, whilst we were only there for a short stay and didn’t require much help from the staff, a lot of the concierges and front staff were so friendly which made us feel very welcomed and the same upon leaving. Will definitely be visiting again in the future!

title: Best Stay in NYC!
text: The Towers at Lotte New York Palace is the best hotel I've stayed in NYC! Everything was amazing! I would like to give special thanks Clara and Miles who made my trip with my mother very special. They accommodated our needs very promptly and kindly by upgrading our room to a corner suite at the Towers. I was very impressed with Clara who took care of us and made sure that our stay is comfortable. I would love to return to this hotel when I come to NYC again!

title: Trip of a lifetime at the most fabulous hotel ever!
text: We were in New York for a week celebrating our son and the staff at the Towers at Lotte New York Palace exceeded all expectations.  One of the managers, Miles, called in advance of our trip to find out what time our plane would be arriving, and was waiting in the lobby with the Hotel Manager, Martin, to celebrate our son.  We were upgraded to a fabulous corner suite overlooking St. Patrick's Cathedral and much of Manhattan. They sent champagne to our suite and gave our son a gift bag full of Lotte swag. Every member of the Lotte Palace Towers was helpful and attentive, but Miles was phenomenal.  He even called when we returned home to be sure we made it home okay.  It was the trip of a lifetime.  I'd never stay anywhere else in New York!

title: Happy vacation
text: This is the first time me and my family visit the Lotte New York Palace. We are so happy with the location and the service here. I want to special mention Clara  and Melody they both give me the best service that I never had before in another hotel, So happy I make a right decision to stay here!

title: Top hotel only made better by the great customer service from Michael Frick at the front desk.
text: The Lotte New York Palace is a beautiful hotel in a fantastic location. The customer service from their staff takes the hotel to another level. They are courteous and knowledgeable about both their hotel and NYC. If I had to pick a standout staff member it would have to be Guest Service Agent Michael Frick, thank you for making our trip perfect.

title: Best hotel in Manhattan
text: I typically do not write reviews but after staying at Lotte I just have to say the hotel is the best I’ve ever stayed in the city, and I’ve been going to NYC for the last 30 years for work and family visits.  The rooms are beautifully appointed and clean, with a breathtaking  view.  The staff from doormen to concierge are friendly and pleasant.  However, I am most impressed with Clara who bent over backwards to make sure we had a pleasant stay and our needs were met.  She made sure our rooms had pens and paper, that the coffee maker was well stocked with pods, and expedited room service when we needed a rush service.  I also wish to thank Michael and Miles for giving us the best accommodations the hotel had to offer, always with great efficiency.  I wish we had discovered this gem sooner, but will be back whenever we visit again.

title: My Review
text: The Lotte New York Palace was my favorite hotel. Everything was amazing. Room service was great. The food was great. I would defiantly come back. I love the Lotte New York Palace. I wish I could have stayed longer!

title: Another Wonderful Birthday Celebration
text:
We were back at our favorite hotel Lotte at the end of June, this time to celebrate my husband’s 75th birthday.  We had a fantastic experience last November when our family gathered to celebrate my 70th birthday, and were looking forward to another celebration in style.  

However, perhaps because of the ease of covid protocols in NYC, the hotel was at full capacity, and the early check-in that Clara had arranged for us did not happen.  In fact, we ultimately checked-in later than the regular check-in time.  We had needed the early check-in because our Acela train arrived in the morning, and we badly needed a room to rest after lunch.  Clara took great care of us during the two plus hours wait, by bringing us bottled water, making sure we had a comfortable space in the hotel lobby to rest, and kept us posted on progress.  Eventually she brought us the room keys and saw to it that our luggage was delivered promptly.  We had reserved a towers corner suite with pantry as before, and again it did not disappoint.    

We had also reserved another suite and a regular room in the palace side for our grown children who were arriving the next day.  Clara and Michael had worked hard before our arrival to upgrade these rooms to the towers side, with the promise of a connecting room to our towers corner suite.  However, even though I had intended for our very young grandchildren to come for the day and nap in the connecting room, again to our disappointment the early check-in did not come through.  Clara tried her best to rush things along, but apparently the previous guests did not check out at the appointed time and were nowhere to be found.  However, kudos to Clara and Miles who then upgraded the suite to another corner suite just like mine two floors down, which was available sooner.  Clara did the leg work and brought the keys to us.  My son and daughter-in-law were so impressed that they decided to stay in to enjoy the spacious and beautiful suite.  Eventually the rooms situation was ironed out, and we finally had the connecting room at 3:30 pm, which defeated the purpose of having booked this room.  If it were not for the collective effort of Clara, Michael and Miles, I would have canceled this room.  

Despite the disastrous situation which was a major inconvenience to our family of ten, Clara made sure we had everything we needed.  The birthday cake I ordered through her was delicious and beautiful.  She brought us a bottle of wine and snack for afternoon tea, compliments of the hotel, and a teddy bear for the kids.   As always, she was a pleasure to work with, and attentive to our every need.  Thanks to Clara, Michael and Miles, we ended up having a wonderful birthday celebration.

title: The best hotel in NYC!!!!
text:
This was our third time in the city and wow this was definitely the best. What a perfect stay we had. Right from checking in to leaving I couldn’t of asked for more. This hotel definitely exceeds expectations and has spoilt me so much I don’t think I ever will want to stay anywhere else.
The rooms were absolutely spotless and total luxury. Every member of staff was helpful and friendly and a special mention to Melody on reception who was so happy and welcoming, Miles the front office manager who patiently tried to resolve a problem with our luggage also George the Greek, what a friendly happy guy. 
If your thinking of booking DO IT, you will not be disappointed! 
THANK YOU, THANK YOU, THANK YOU hotel Lotte, this will not be our last time staying with you!!More

title: STAY HERE.   TRUST US.
text:
We spent an entire week at The Towers at Lotte New York Palace.   The experience was fantastic from the moment we arrived.  We were greeted by Omar the bellman, who helped us with our luggage, and was happy to help with any questions we may have had.  Throughout our stay, he would continue to say hello and make sure we had everything we needed and were having a good time.  

Olga at the front desk went out of her way to get us the best room we could; the friendly maitre d’etage, Ahmed, showed us a potential room was incredibly kind.   The hotel manager, Miles, treated us like the VIPs we are not.  

Diego and Ani were brilliant concierges.   They were helpful at every turn.    And they teamed up to locate a great brunch spot for our teenage daughter’s birthday.   

The service is just way beyond what I could have hoped for.    We stay at very nice hotels, when able.   But this was just more caring, personal, and attentive service than even other fine hotels.  

And, of course, the rooms are great.    Incredibly clean, nice bathrooms.   Linens are good, beds comfy.   And the view…500 feet up, overlooking St. Patrick’s and Rockefeller Center.    So good.   The perfect location in Midtown, near everything but out of the madness, also made the stay better.   

Typically, after a full week living out of a hotel, we are ready to get the heck out of there.   We could’ve stayed here for months.   Rest assured, we will be staying there next time we are in NYC.

title: Summer Vacation
text: We have enjoyed our stay at this hotel very much we have been able to be assisted by by Clara who always had a smile when we walked through the door and was always very helpful if we needed anything we hope to be back very soon and spend a few more days here

title: Vacation
text:
Very well stay
Good area
Extremely helpful by Clara
Always available to be helpful
And very pleasant and cheerful
I will highly recommend this hotel to our friends when visiting New York
Hope to return next year

title: Positive Reviews Confirmed
text: The Towers at Lotte New York Palace has wonderful staff, amazing spaces and views, and is clean! The valet was patient and attentive when we arrived. Everyone at the front desk was cheerful and efficient. The common areas are stunning and, importantly, there is a neat non-chain coffee shop in the building. Our room is THE NICEST HOTEL ROOM WE HAVE EVER HAD! If you value extremely nice rooms and views, stay here. For our family, we especially appreciated the cleanliness of the rooms—our experience is that this has been lacking with stays elsewhere. The location is great if you plan to visit multiple areas of Manhattan. We were starting to lose confidence in hotels being a real luxurious get away—confidence restored!

title: Vacation
text: We enjoyed our stay! Lovely hotel, Clara was extremely helpful in showing us different rooms! She’s the best. She was able to show us the towers and the palace. Overall great stay and definitely recommend

title: Business
text: A very nice hotel, with a beautiful view. The employees are very gentle. I would like to mention CLARA, who helped me anytime I asked her. Nice person. I truly recommend the stay to my friends who are coming to New York.

title: Clara  was awesome
text: Clara was very helpful and informative. She was very friendly and knows her stuff! Great customer service. Hotel was fabulous!  Her recommendation  is on point.  Thank you Clara for being very awesome. Will come again to visit. New York New York!

title: My Bday at the best place ever!
text: What can I say about this hotel? well.. it has been my home away from home for years since I was a baby. This year I had a surprise bday party with most of my friends and it was perfect. Samir like always, is perfect in every way. He helped my mom to decorate our suite so amazing. Anne Marie welcomed us with her smile, Miles and Becky are always above and beyond,  Clara always so nice, Diego , Rene, Melody, Teresa,  Kal ( so amazing all the time), the housekeepers who kept our suite immaculate, Maurice always making sure we were safe. My friends were impressed with the hotel, the view, the location, the VIP treatment we received. I cant say enough about the hotel because i absolutely love it. I cant thank you guys enough for everything you always do for me. Thank you again!! It was perfect in every way. I highly recommend the Towers to everyone who is looking for the perfect hotel, with the perfect view, location and staff.

title: A bit on the pricey side but great location.
text:
A good hotel.
The “upgrade” we paid for was a unfortunate mistake as it’s no better than the older side of the hotel…… just a higher floor but an old room with smart blinds and lighting……a non starter really , because there’s a single panel to control everything that sits on one bedside table. So…… in order to turn anything on or off  you have to climb over the person beside you.
Not a single USB outlet in the room so bring chargers !
Two chairs and no footrests.
Looks like they may have removed couches from the seating area. No coffee maker in the room. You have to ask for one, and then an antique machine with 2 pouches is delivered and no replenishing this each day by housekeeping either.
Turndown service on happened on our first night. I wonder if cutting corners in these high end hotels is the new normal ?
If you enjoy a clean hospitable well located place to rest your head in NYC with excellent courteous staff and don’t mind feeling gouged, then go ahead and book, but beware that all that glitters isn’t gold !

title: Excellent stay
text: This was our first time staying at the Lotte.  The hotel is beautiful and perfectly situated.  It was very easy to walk and get to the sights we wanted to see.  The staff was all wonderful.  They were cheerful and always helpful.  They handled all of our requests.  We stayed in the 2 BR corner suite.  It was huge and beautifully decorated.  Our room was in need of a little updating, but very comfortable with incredible views from the 49th floor.  There are only 2 elevators to serve the upper floors and they warned us beforehand that they were doing maintenance/updating to the elevators so we understood why they were slow.  Overall a fantastic experience and I highly recommend staying there.

title: Vacaciones en NY
text: Es nuestra primera vez el hotel. Queremos destacar la cordialidad y amabilidad del personal, especialmente el de Clara. La habitación tiene una vista increíble de la ciudad. Estamos muy complacidos de haberlos elegido. Sin dudas volveremos a este hotel la próxima vez que estemos en NY.

title: Book the palace for your wedding. Ask for Adam
text:
We had our wedding reception at the palace and it was like a movie.  The venue itself is exceptional - the gold room for cocktail hour and our reception in the Villard ball room was unforgettable.  The food and drinks are exceptional. We had a 9 piece band and large group.
However what made our day special was the people from the palace that went above and beyond that day and all the days leading up.  Our coordinator Adam made everything turn key and gave us service and treatment unlike anything we’ve ever experienced.  He helped plan ever single detail so that on our day we truly good enjoy and didn’t have a single thing to worry about.  Our journey with Adam became special after our tasting where we got to try absolutely everything and select what we wanted for our party. From that moment on, it was first class service. Adam answered our calls and requests every step of the way and made sure the day was tailored to what we wanted.  He worked with our vendors directly including the florist, photographer, and band to make sure they were on point.  The day went so smoothly and he guided us.  His attention to detail (setting up a spectacular oyster bar and literally giving our space a spritz of nice scents) while never losing sight of the big picture is truly a talent that made us feel like top priority every minute.

title: Really wanted to love the hotel but...
text: The Towers at Lotte NY Palace is a beautiful property.  The elegance of the original hotel is exceptional. We loved the expansive size of our suite, being on the 51st floor and looking out on the city and East River. The Concierges' dinner suggestions/reservations were excellent .What we didn't love was the lack of amenities or attention that we had expected.  While I can assume that part of this is due to the pandemic I believe the consumer should be made aware.  ie the minibar was empty; there wasn't a Nespresso in the room; "butler" service that was touted was nonexistent or simply not offered. It would be helpful if a list of amenities were listed in the room in the same way the breakfast menu was. We had advised the hotel our trip in part was for our 50th Anniversary, no acknowledgement was made.   At checkout I was most surprised we could not obtain a full portfolio of our charges.  I do look forward to returning and am hopeful full service will resume.

Out of all the trio I’ve been on this hotel was the best experience I’ve had. Everyone was so sweet . Miles was great and it was so sad leaving everyone at this hotel behind . Beyond grateful and thankful for everyone I met !

title: LOVED our Stay!!!
text: I can’t say enough about the staff! Everyone was AMAZING!! Especially Melody and Miles. They went out of their way to make sure my boys and I had a fantastic time in NYC! They gave us Yankees hats as part of our package and my boys wore them proudly around the city (even though we are Red Sox fans 😬 ). I highly recommend the hotel. It’s such a great location - one block from FAO Schwarz, Top of the Rock and roller skating in Rockefeller Center. A beautiful view of St Patrick’s Cathedral as it’s also directly across the street. A plus and very fun that it was Minion week!!! Buildings were lit up in yellow  :) Already looking forward to next time! Thank you to all the staff at Lotte New York Palace!

title: Amazing hotel with excellent service in the perfect location
text: We had an amazing stay during a holiday weekend at the Lotte. The hotel is located near ample subway stops, 5th Avenue shopping, and walkable to every point of interest. The service at the hotel from the front desk, reception, house cleaning, restaurant and cafe are outstanding. Miles and Denise went the extra mile to make sure we were abundantly comfortable and even allowed us a late checkout prior to our international flight. Also, we traveled with our 8 year old twins, and all the staff made them feel welcome (let them play in the revolving doors, always greeted them cheerfully, and even gave them child robes when we arrived). You will love this hotel!

title: Another Excellent Stay at the Lotte New York Palace
text: This is our go to hotel in New York. Miles, one of the managers and the staff, are simply the best! Miles makes sure your stay is memorable, the service is personable and professional. The rooms are always clean. Two fresh robes and slippers are hanging in the closet. Someone is always available to bring you an amenity you may have forgotten. The towels and linens are plentiful and the beds are comfortable. The views from any room at this hotel are beautiful.

title: Very helpful service- especially Miles!
text: I was staying elsewhere in New York but had previously stayed at the Lotte and wanted to move back to this hotel. Upon explaining this at the Lotte, Miles Gomez - Assistant Front Office Manager- took the time out to show us two corner suites at the Towers Lotte New York Palace.  I was really impressed and his commitment to assisting was commendable. He made every effort to ensure that my daughter and I were comfortable, which was very appreciated. Overall, incredibly friendly service and we felt very well taken care of at this hotel!

title: Amazing hotel and amazing service
text: The hotel is beautiful and it had amazing service. The bellman Omar was on top of everything and overall phenomenal! Big thank you Omar! Hands down one of the best hotels that I have ever stayed in, spectacular!

title: Amazing place to stay
text:
From the minute you arrive out in front you are treated like family. 
Our checkin was quick and efficient and Lincy went above and beyond for us 
Rene at the concierge desk also made wonderful dinner recommendations and we loved it.all of the staff we encountered were equally wonderful, helpful and welcoming. 
Our room was stunning and we wanted for for nothing at all!  
Plus there is so much to do and see close by. We absolutely love staying here!

title: Great historic hotel in a central location
text:
We loved staying at the Lotte Palace in our suite. It was impeccably clean, spacious, and easy to navigate to. We would definitely recommend for anyone visiting NYC. 

The bed was extremely comfortable and the room was nice and quiet as well. We enjoyed using the mini kitchen to store food and drinks while in town.

title: Estancia excepcional
text:
No tengo más que buenas palabras para este hotel. Desde el proceso de reserva todo fueron facilidades y atenciones. Era un viaje muy especial para mi hija y solicité una habitación con buenas vistas y nos hicieron un upgrade a una habitación de la torre. Las vistas eran impresionantes, la ubicación fantástica, la recepción muy buena, tuvieron el detalle de regalarle un peluche a mi hija. El personal del hotel fue muy amable y servicial durante toda la estancia.
Guardaré un recuerdo muy especial de este viaje y en parte gracias al Lotte New York Palace, no puedo más que darles las gracias por unos días inolvidables.

title: Amazing Hotel for NYC Trip
text: I came to New York City for a 4-night vacation and to celebrate my wife's birthday. Originally had booked a room at the regular section of Lotte New York Palace, but I decided to upgrade to the Towers portion of the hotel, which was a great idea and ensured that the vacation was extra special (that and some of the dinners we had...). The price is higher than I would typically spend, but I would strongly consider coming back to the Towers when we return to New York. Very luxurious and classy hotel, great people, great amenities, great view from the room, great location, couldn't ask for more from the stay. We were out in the city most of the day, but it was a pleasure to come back and relax in the clean, comfortable, upscale room.

title: Perfect Experience
text:
After researching many NYC hotels, we decided on The Towers for our 50th Anniversary. It was perfect. Nothing but the highest praise for the staff. Jimm Kalinka, Towers guest service, graciously made sure our suite had an amazing view overlooking St. Patrick’s. Concierge Diego was so helpful with our planning and it was a plus to reach out to that staff for restaurant reservations before arrival. Henry, our personal bellman, was so friendly and made us feel that any needs would be taken care of by him. There was a delightful young woman at the Pomme Palais, I believe her name is Deborah, who was just wonderful every single day. 
Exactly what we wanted, real NYC class!

title: Oasis of calm & civility
text: The Towers at the Lotte New York Palace were an exquisite setting for a much needed getaway from reality. I am so grateful for the kind and friendly staff that made us feel like royalty at every turn. Fran warmly welcomed us at the door, swiftly unloaded our car and lead us to the desk where Jimm effortlessly checked us in and offered excellent tips about the area.  Ahmed, our maitre’d etáge, unlocked the magic of our beautiful suite. The views of Manhattan from every direction were breathtaking. Yriz kept that giant room impeccably tidy and comfortable. Staying in midtown can sometimes be loud and crowded but not at the Palace-our suite was so quiet and luxurious with amenities like room darkening shades with a button, Bluetooth everything, and thoughtful cushy sitting areas. The Palace is in the middle of everything but a true oasis of calm and civility. I loved never waiting for an elevator-there was always one ready! Cocktails in the Gold Room and breakfast in the Villard restaurant were truly special because those historic spaces are so magnificent. I can’t thank Adam Reigler enough for helping make this trip so spectacular. I’ve stayed in a lot of beautiful hotels but the Palace is truly the best!

title: Great views, staff, & location!!!!!!
text: I stayed in Lotte New York Palace Towers to celebrate my girlfriend’s birthday. The location is amazing hence the reason we chose to stay at this property for the first time. Upon checkin we were assisted by your wonderful doormen and bellmen. We remember Henry who gave us a walk through of the mansion and assisted us to our room. At check-in there was an issues with my room, we booked to look over the cathedral and for some reason this was not done. Thankfully a manager (Louis)  was in the area and assisted us with a nice upgrade to a view. This definitely made our day and will be definitely coming back. Your entire staff in the lobby is amazing. And again we thank the manager for rapidly assisting us with the view upgrade.

title: Miles at the front desk went above & beyond!
text: We've been working with Miles Gomez to put together an amazing trip for some of our travelers and he has absolutely blown us out of the water with his attention to detail and care. If all of the staff is as wonderful as he is, the Lotte is the only place to be in New York!

title: A phenomenal experience, brilliant staff and a wonderful concierge
text: I stayed at the Towers at the Palace from May 19 - May 30, 2022. It was a wonderful stay at a magnificent hotel and location. Apart from everything else, concierge Isabella was sensational and made my stay and trip to Ney York so much better and memorable.  Each day in the morning we would discuss what I had done the previous day and she would then have more suggestions as to what to do next, what shows to book, restaurants to attend and walking tours to take. Nothing was too much trouble for her and every suggestion Isabella made was 100% spot on. So thank you Isabella for being a fantastic concierge and thank you New York Palace for providing such a magnificent experience. Regards. James Barron

title: Excellent long stay at Lotte NY Palace!!!!
text: I booked a suite with a kitchen in the Towers months ago in anticipation of a long stay to visit family and attend a wedding and take in NYC.  Apartment rentals in NYC have been disappointing and we value having a kitchen - my search for top hotels with rooms that have kitchens yielded this hotel and one other and we went for this one because it is a suite.  First of all the reservationist was excellent, confirming details of the room and getting us a good rate.  She warned us that the suite kitchen might not be stocked on arrival due to Covid.  The hotel is in a great location at Madison and 50th with an entrance on 51st as well - walkable to Broadway and Central Park and many other great parts of the city - easy access to subway and buses.  On arrival, there was indeed confusion around stocking the kitchen with equipment, dishes, etc - it was bare and getting that sorted was a bit of a hassle.  Charlotte in customer experience was essential in turning the tide and by the next morning, we had met Samir, the Maitre d’Etage and then later his colleague Maitre d’Etage Ahmed.  They are both spectacular in terms of attention and follow-up - the kitchen has all we need - the suite is spacious with a beautiful view.  The hotel manager Martin did a great job in making up for the first day issues.  The hotel gym is excellent as is the bar.
