Service is great - the Maitre d’Etage even received our grocery order and put the groceries away.  Highly recommend!

title: NYC Wedding Preparation + Visiting Friends
text: Our visit was to finalize my daughters wedding arrangements and to meet friends.  The hotel staff was very friendly, thorough and efficient. The rooms are very clean and spacious The beds are amongst the most comfortable we've slept on in a hotel (US, EU & Asia).  Our daughters wedding is at the Lotte NY Palace this summer. The wedding staff has been great and we are very much looking forward to her wedding!

title: The Towers are the Lotte Palace
text: The Lotte Palace really knows how to treat its guests.  This was my second stay at the Towers of the Lotte Palace. The service was amazing from the greeting at the door to every detail of the housekeeping and service.  Of course, you can't beat the views from the room. I would recommend the Towers are the Lotte Palace for any New York getaway.

I had a wonderful experience planning our stay in New York City thanks to Ani Bedrossian.
She gave us some great restaurant recommendations as well as options on site-seeing.
 Ani’s personal attention to our interest meant so much.

title: Highly Recommend the Lotte Palace!
text:
Exceptional service - from the doorman on. Everyone is pleasant and works hard to ensure your stay is enjoyable. This hotel - which I will always associate with the old Helmsley Hotel because of  it’s quality and rich history - is a wonderful way to spend time in NYC. 

An employee named Clara, whom we met in the lobby one day, would always greet us and make sure our needs were met. 

As for the facility, it is a bit broken in, as you see in any established hotel in the world. But that’s just part of its charm. We have been here for 17 days in a suite in the Towers side. The view of Manhattan is amazing. It has all the amenities you would expect in a 5 star hotel. And housekeeping is excellent. 

Highly recommend!!

title: Fave hotel in nyc
text: I’ve been coming here for years w my grandparents and the bellmen always remember us and are so kind. The service is amazing the interior too. I can’t wait to return and the location is incredibly convenient.

title: Amazing stay in an iconic location!
text:
My husband and I were getting married in NYC and had booked to stay for 4 nights in a Signature Suite at the Lotte New York Palace for our wedding weekend. Upon arrival at the hotel the check in desk informed us that we’d been upgraded to one of the Corner Suites in the The Towers! Now I’m sure the room we had originally booked would have been lovely, but the Corner Suite in The Towers was absolutely incredible - the views from the rooms were amazing, and the rooms themselves were so comfortable and 
welcoming. We chose the Palace due to its proximity to our wedding venue and its iconic history (I was a big Gossip Girl fan back in the day!) and it did not disappoint - the staff were all incredibly helpful and welcoming, service was top notch, to quote my husband ‘everything was flawless’. 

The concierge team were also very helpful and knowledgeable, ahead of our trip I’d been emailing them to arrange on-site Covid tests and they sorted this out for us easily.

In summary, if you are considering staying at this hotel I would say don’t hesitate and just book it, you will not be disappointed! We will definitely be staying again next time we are in NYC.

title: WONDERFUL to stay at The Lotte New York Palace again!!!
text:
If you’re looking for location near to very good things, if you’re looking for the best cleaned hotel and spacious rooms, if you’re looking for good service... OK! You’ll get it all at The Lotte New York Palace!
BUT... the best part is THE STAFF!!!
The hotel is incredible! For over 20 years it has been the same and better...
BECKY ; nice, understanding, accommodating sweet, beautiful and always attentive to see all of  our necessities.
MILES; above and beyond all of our expectations!
Working to make our stay wonderful, like always!
CLARA; sweet, caring... no words to describe how many times she had helped us during our stay.
SAMIR; our best friend forever atThe New York Palace.
Helpful and always ready to serve and bring happiness!
DEMARIS; sweet, efficient, helpful and friendly.
OLGA, SANDY, TEREZA, LINDSY, FRANCESCA, 
NANCY,NATSUKO, always available in the middle of a very busy time.
DIEGO, RENE, KARL, ANI, the best concierges ever!
The Pommè Palais team : MARK, ARLENE, VERONICA, working hard and they are so dedicated!
At the SPA, CARA is special!
Our cleaning crew FAITH and MARIA were awesome. 
MAURICE, MATT, GEORGE, RAY, FRAN ,always ready to help!
At this time it was a pleasure that I could talk to Mr. JAMES PETRUS and express, as a very long time guest, my thoughts seeing through the “ guest eyes” and let him know how great the staff/friends are and how they keep the life going at the hotel, by the way ,THE BEST HOTEL EVER! Even during these difficult times.
We wish to see the whole team back working together, like before the pandemic.
With love, wishing to see you soon!

title: Best hotel and staff in NYC
text: Everything is amazing in this hotel,the gym and spa is absolutely essential during our stays and the service in room service are very efficient and fast,from the service to the staff especially the front desk Clara and others has been super helpful! We will be back next time!

title: Comfort and kindness in the heart of Manhattan
text:
My daughter and I took a trip to New York to celebrate he graduation from Elementary School. The Towers at the Palace were the perfect choice for exploring the city. Other than the terrific location, the two things that stand out are the wonderfully friendly and attentive staff, and the extreme comfort of the room! Put together, you can feel the stress of the city melt away the minute you walk through the front door at the Palace. 
Matt, Tom, and Clara were among the incredible, omnipresent bell staff who act as warm hosts attending to, of course, the bags and doors, but also your spirit. Ready with recommendations and directions, they dispense them with a warmth and a smile that lets you know you’ve got friends in this city. 
The room has amazing views and the comfort is unmatched. Perfectly appointed with storage and seating, settling in is a calming luxury. An electronic panel on the nightstand controls the shades, lights, and temperature so you can perfectly set your sleeping environment. And the beds are pure comfort! 
Stay with the Towers at the Palace for the optimal NYC experience!

title: Outstanding customer service
text: Thanks to Isabella at the Concierge desk and Anna-Marie at the Front Desk for making this a great experience!  Isabella secured a dinner reservation at a popular restaurant and Anna-Marie quickly resolved a maintenance issue. Look forward to staying again soon.

title: Amazing service!!!!
text: This review is really to praise the customer service of the Lotte, displayed especially by Miles Gomes and Florin, for their outstanding service. I accidentally dropped my laptop off the 31st floor, onto the roof of a building that was not even affiliated with the hotel. We phoned down to the front desk and immediately Miles Gomez began assisting us. We let him know of the unfortunate situation, and he assured us he would help us. We return to him not 3 hours later, and there was the laptop, recovered, with the help of Florin, the engineer, from the 9th floor of a building, after falling 22 floors. I could not have wished for any better service. Throughout the entire ordeal Miles was courteous, and extremely understanding of our extremely rare and bizarre situation. This is our first time staying in the Lotte, and I’m sure it won’t be our last!

title: Lotte
text: We had a nice time the hotel is perfectly situated for walking everywhere.  Michael Frick at the front desk was very welcoming, helpful and he upgraded our room to the towers. Which was a stunning view of New York!!

title: Towers are Not Luxury Hotel
text:
The hotel is pretty bad, usually I can overlook a worn and dated property of you get good service, regrettably that has not been our experience at the Towers in the Lotte New York Palace. The only friendly people at the hotel are the doormen. Check in staff is pretty incompetent have a hard time communicating with them and I just watched someone else have a similar issue. They are also understaffed at the Towers with 3 or 4 people waiting at busier times. 

The rooms are large but have quite a bit if issues, my king room did not have a garbage can in the bathroom and after 3 days of asking for one there is still no garbage can in the bathroom. You'd think even if my requests to the front desk were ignored, housekeeping would notice the tissues, dental floss, and other garbage on the vanity and do something about it. 

We also have a 2 bedroom suite and the second bedroom with twin beds has a broken cold water faucet; ot has come lose from the vanity and when you try to turn the water on the whole faucet turns and you are unable to turn the water on. Once again our requests to the front desk have been ignored for three days. We're just using hot water and the half bath for cold water. 

Also, please be aware that there are only 2 elevators for the 15 floors in the towers and wait times can be long, they are also small so you might have to wait for 2 or 3 elevator cars for you to fit. 

Finally, turndown service wasn't done in any if our 3 rooms for the three nights we've been here. 

As I mentioned before, the rooms are large, views are great, and the doormen are super friendly. Other than that lower your expectations to an average Hilton and you might not be disappointed. Won't be coming back.

title: D Costello
text: Fabulous stay at this hotel…. Every member of the staff so friendly, welcoming, and kind.  Especially Isabella at the concierge desk.  Other family members suggested this hotel and I am so glad that I took their advice.

title: The best feature of this hotel is the concierge!
text: The room was okay. The hotel was okay. But the service provided by the concierge, Isabella, was absolutely outstanding. She has been so very helpful and very friendly. And very good at her job. Isabella helped us navigate all the attractions we wanted to visit and made our time in New York very pleasant.

title: Perfect location
text: My husband and I liked The Towers very much. The price of the rooms is out of line considering that the hotel seems very understaffed, however. Hopefully they will bring more staff back now that the pandemic is waning. I would definitely stay there again.

title: Ubicación estratégica
text:
Muy lindo el Hotel, excelente la ubicación y el personal es muy amable, especialmente Clara que es una genia, te hace sentir como en casa.

The Hotel is very nice, the location is excellent and the staff is very friendly, especially Clara who is a genius, she makes you feel at home.

title: Quiet Iconic Retreat in the Middle of Manhattan
text: We found this hotel to be very clean and a quiet retreat. The two elevators leading to the upper floors of the Towers are sometimes a bottleneck at morning rush hour but otherwise were not a problem and were fast and responsive. There is a wonderful bar called Rarities which offers every conceivable rare spirit and has a wonderful 1930's charm and décor. Getting around was easy once at the hotel as everything we wanted to do in Manhattan was easy to get to whether it be the Opera or Museums, Central Park or businesses in Midtown.

title: Very good experience
text: We booked a suite in the Towers. The rooms were large and well appointed. Reception and bellman service was smooth. We had a minor problem with the light in the room, which was treated quickly and effectively by the hotel. And we had an excellent though expensive room-service breakfast. All in all, a very good experience

title: wedding/event
text: We decided to pick The Towers at Lotte New York Palace as our wedding venue and could not have been happier with the level of detail, attention and service that Adam Riegler and his staff provided. Throughout the entire process (approximately 9 months) Adam was very responsive via email and so helpful in putting the whole day together. He provided us with his professional opinion when asked and I'm so glad I listened to all of his advice because he is such an expert and professional in his area. Adam was super accommodating, and on the day of, he was with me from the beginning of the day, until my family and I checked out of the hotel. Adam definitely went above and beyond and was so attentive the entire time, and even helped me to carry my dress, around with me when we took pictures for hours. He didn't rush us once or complain, he made sure that we got food and drinks and water and made sure that everything was on schedule. I seriously can go on and on about how great he was and how great the hotel staff were overall. We are so so happy we picked The Towers at Lotte New York Palace for our wedding and I would recommend it to anyone for any kind of event.

title: Overall good but I wouldn’t say great
text:
I recently stayed at the Towers for one night midweek.  I arrived to the hotel at 8:30 am and was able to check into my room which was nice.  The room was large, even by New York standards.  I had a great view from the 53rd floor down on the cathedral.  I would say overall the room and bathroom are a little tired and run down.  I wasn’t searching for things to be picky about but the paint you can tell is chipping a bit.  The bathroom needs a make over.  The room was very clean though and overall in good condition.  The room was $1000 a night so when you are paying that much you notice little things.  

A couple downsides to my stay.  One of the two tower elevators was having mechanical issues while I was there so getting an elevator at times took a while.  Not a huge deal.  The most frustrating thing for me was after I get to the room, about 30 mins later the door to my room swings open and a maintenance worker walks right in.  He immediately sees me and stops, apologizing that he had no idea the room was occupied.  I say it’s okay, don’t worry, I was fully dressed so no issues.  After he leaves, about 10 mins later, another maintenance worker does the same exact thing.  Waltzes right in using his master key.  Again, apologizes and leaves.  At this point I call downstairs and ask the front desk to handle this which I am told they will do.  Yet, 10 mins passes and a third maintenance worker again lets himself into my room while I am sitting there.  That’s 3 maintenance men who walked into my room with their keys unannounced while I was inside.  I was pretty annoyed at this point because I had already called down.  So I called again.  The person I spoke to was apologetic and I explained that as a single female traveler, it’s pretty alarming to have multiple men enter your room.  I was also about to leave for the day so I wanted to make sure my things were secure.  I went down to the lobby and the staff apologized and said they would speak to maintenance which was fine, but just confusing like why now 45 mins after the first person had entered was this conversion just happening with maintenance and not after the first call down? 

That little experience tainted my stay for me so while others may have had great experiences I just feel like for $1000 I’ll probably go elsewhere next time I’m in New York.

title: 5 star hotel, 3 star dining
text: We booked our stay at the Lotte New York Palace because of recommendations from our friends and the suggestions of our travel agent. We were greeted by George and he presented our very excited 5 year old with a teddy bear and sparkly tiara! The property itself is beautiful. We stayed in a 2 room suite in The Towers and were immediately taken with the beautiful views of the city and the tasteful furnishings. The beds were comfortable and the room was pristinely clean. Our only negative experiences were with room service- we never had an order arrive complete or correct. We ordered a pancake for our daughter and were told "25 minutes or less"- 2 phone calls and 1 hour and 15 minutes later it arrived. The Gold Room is beautiful but the menu for dinner is anemic- it mirrors the room service menu exactly.

title: Simply Perfect
text: I've been searching for the 'perfect' New York City hotel for many years, and I've finally found it.  The location is ideal - close to my firm's NY office but also convenient for theatre and restaurants.  The suite in the Towers was large and comfortable, with a beautiful view over St Patrick's Cathedral.  I couldn't be happier with the hotel and the staff and look forward to my next visit.

title: Impeccable service and iconic luxury
text:
Wow. I hadn’t stayed in the Palace in many years, and we were just delighted with the experience. This place is a NY landmark, and the team there is really superb. 
A few of our friends came to watch the Oscars, and we had an amazing night. I was impressed right away with the professional, courteous service. Several of the staff — Samir, Salim and Oscar to name a few — helped us get settled into a gorgeous suite upstairs. The room in the tower had spectacular views of the city. It was impeccably clean with every detail and luxury we could want. 
A very special thanks to Francesca who set up our stay and was so wonderful to work with. And thanks to Diego who is the best concierge in New York. The whole team at the Lotte Palace treated us like family and we are so very grateful to each of you.

title: Nice overall and great location.
text:
This was our first stay here somewhat due to Ryne's affinity for Gossip Girl. We were very pleased. Our corner suite was one of the largest (regular suites) I've stayed in. it was extremely comfortable. Nice closet space. Magnificent views of the city. There is also a powder room which is always nice. There was also a kitchen/bar space. Unfortunately, there were no glasses or other utensils and the minibar was not stocked. I would also say that the decor could use just a slight update - nothing major. Nothing looked worn. the bed seemed to have a plastic (rubber?) mattress pad which was not comfortable. 
Service was a standout - from check in (Thanks Jim!) to the door men who were all friendly and attentive to room service and house keeping. Finally, the location of the hotel was great. Looking forward to our return.

title: Good value
text: I stayed in the Towers section of the hotel.  For the size of the rooms, and level of luxury, the hotel offers a very good value considering it's NYC.  Great location as well close to 5th avenue, and a short walk to Broadway area.

title: Always perfect❤️
text:
I wonder how many times I can write a review for the Towers.. let me start again with the amazing location, safe, clean, and Covid perfect.  This hotel has everything  one looks for in a five star hotel. The beds are incredible, the water pressure is perfect, the sheets are soft and the view is breathtaking. Choose the corners suite with pantry. it is the best in the house. Clara always providing the best to us . She made some amazing candied walnuts and gave them to us. I am impressed with her promptness to help and anticipate needs.  Miles is a gem! He is extremely caring and he saved us when my flight was cancelled and was able to maneuver everything for us to stay one more night on his day off. He is incredible and deserves all of the recognition that one can give. Thank you Miles!! Diego, Rene and Ani are amazing. Diego has the best restaurant tips and when I listen to him I don’t regret it. Ani is calm and attentive to detail.  . Rene is our “out of the box” guy.. his tips are trendy and fun.  Maria and Faith are great housekeepers. Arleni, Veronica and Mark are very attentive even though Pomme Palais is so busy all the time. Shout out to Delmasi, Sandy and Olga who are always paying attention to our needs.
Thank you Becky for everything and Natsuko for Lucas’ cookies. I love the attention of detail. 
Once more beyond expectations!!!

title: Amazing!
text: Coming to the Towers to me is like staying home.  I love the location and like I always say, the family that I have formed since I was very little. Clara as always exceding expectations and care with me, Miles is so cool, Diego always giving the best tips, Rene my shoe/fashion buddy, Ani always so sweet and kind. The girls at Pomme Palais, Arleni and Veronica are the best and Mark makes the best coffee according to my mom. Too bad I did not see Samir ( next time hopefully). If you are reading this review before you make your trip to NYC, I know you won't be disappointed if you choose this hotel. Thank you Becky and Natsuko for the cookies!! Also if you are worried about COVID protocols, they are amazing and are following protocols. Can't wait to be back!

title: I’m In Love
text: Just returned from a three night stay in the Jr. Executive Suite in the towers on the 54th floor. I fell in love the minute I walked into our room. The view is amazing. The room was clean and very spacious. Everyone at the hotel was friendly and professional. Special thanks to Samir for giving my granddaughter a crown for her birthday while we were waiting to check in. Special thanks to the concierge Diego for arranging transportation for a concert at Madison Square Garden. I love the Lotte New York Palace. The location is perfect. We were given a tour of the hotel. We saw where Gossip Girl was filmed. I loved everything about this hotel. We had a great time. The hotel is expensive but it was worth the splurge! We definitely plan to return.

title: Amazing Front Office Manager and Fabulous Hotel
text: I continue to book the Lotte New York for a very particular colleague with extremely high standards. The Lotte never fails to disappoint! I had the pleasure of working with MIles Gomez, Front Office Manager as I was in dire need of assistance. Miles went above and beyond to assist me with all my requests and then some. Working with someone so gracious and professional is a rarity these days and I'm beyond grateful for his assistance. The hotel is immaculate, centrally located and exceeds all expectations. I highly recommend and encourage you to book!

title: S  the best place to stayQ!
text:
We have traveled to New York City for several years prior to COVID because our son worked in NYC. We were always treated well and got to know many of the members of their staff. Our son now lives in Florida but we did meet in NYC last week and were able to see our friends at the Towers again. Thank you to Clara for being such s kind and special person! She always makes us feel welcome. Jimm at the desk was very professional and helped us in many ways during our visit. 

The room service food was quick and hot and housekeeping was accommodating.

The location is second to none and the hotel is historic. Rooms are surprisingly very spacious and I enjoy the Molton Brown accessories.

I will not stay in any other hotel in NYC!

title: Top hotel in New York
text:
World class 5 star hotel in central New York.  Rooms are amongst the largest in NYC. Well appointed and very comfortable. No noise and temperature controls worked well.

Front desk was friendly and efficient as was the belldesk.

Breakfast was also excellent but pricing was also full.

Great views over St Patricks, the Rockefeller Center and 5th avenue.

title: Amazing hotel and incredible staff!
text:
First yes the scaffold is still up in the front courtyard and doesn't look like its being taken down soon but lets be honest - with covid hotels are probably catching up on work that should have been done a while back.

Now to the good points and there are many!!!! 

Concierge: I travelled to the hotel from the UK for my anniversary and Diego on Concierge made my holiday as great as it was! He answered so many emails quickly with so much information and assistance.

Rooms: The room was a Towers Corner suite. It was utterly amazing, clean, spacious and just everything we had hoped for. My in-laws stayed in a Queen bed Palace room and this was by far the biggest "normal" guestroom I had ever seen for New York. Their room was like ours - clean and spacious. Whilst tea/coffee facilities are not in rooms as standard at moment I did request them and they were in the rooms waiting for us.

Location: The location is just superb, in Midtown, just a few blocks from subway stops, close to so many sights.

There is the coffee shop downstairs which was so friendly and did proper coffee as opposed to Starbucks stuff!

This hotel was just all we hoped for and will stay here again when we come back to NYC.

title: Best Concierge and Location
text: I want to  give a shout out  to Ani ( I hope this is the way her name  is correctly spelled. She absolutely went out of her way to get us the reservation we wanted for our anniversary   and point us to other amazing options with such dedication and  proffesionalism. By the way. Every  person in  the hotel was extremely warm and polite. We  had a great time and  special mention to the doorman, who asked me to tell everybody, NYC is back.   Gloria

title: Another fabulous stay
text: This was our second stay at the hotel.  Because we had such a wonderful experience with Clara during our last stay in November, I was looking forward to being back and seeing her again.  However, to my disappointment, she informed me that she would be off during the weekend we would be there.  But all is not lost, as she immediately offered her help to make sure we would be well taken care of in her absence.  She called the day before our arrival to say she had arranged with Miles and Michael (a big thank you to them!) for a room upgrade with early check-in, which turned out to be tremendously helpful.  Sure enough, the next morning, Michael was expecting us and was there to greet us personally when we checked in.  He was friendly and efficient, and the entire process was fast and easy.  He had a beautiful and spotless room on a high floor with a spectacular view of St Patrick waiting for us.  I was not expecting that the amazing service the staff showed during our first day would preceed us this time, and I appreciate the time and effort they made to prepare for our arrival.  I might add that Clara also recommended a casual kid-friendly breakfast place nearby to take my 3 year old grandson to.  With the exception of not seeing Clara’s friendly face, everything about our stay was perfect, and I can’t wait to be back.

title: Amazing
text: Our stay at the Palace was fantanstic. Everything was very clean and the food was delicious. All the staff was extremely polite, especially Clara, Michael and Maurisse who made our stay definitely better.

title: 5 Star Service
text: After staying at a few mid-town 5 star hotels, and THEN staying at The Palace, I don't know why anyone would choose any other hotel.  This hotel was a class act.  From the staff to the service level.  They are friendly, no task is inconvenient, and best part there is ZERO attitude that the other mid-town hotels seem to have these days.  Every single thing this hotel did was on point, done with elegance, and handled with grace.  It's been a very long time since I've experienced a hotel where I literally can't wait to return.  What an amazing experience.  I'm now a loyal fan.

title: Relaxing break in centre of everything
text: Staff very helpful esp Clara. Cathedral room a must great views (better the higher you go) didn’t pull the blinds down as the nighttime view was spectacular (|if you like lit high rise…). Only criticism being currently no restaurant open in evening only extremely limited meals at bar., believe that is changing soon.

title: Concierge
text: We have been to New York several times but wanted some suggestions on new places to shop and eat.. Ani and Renee were super helpful with suggestions and booking reservations for us everything they suggested was Fabulous now we have our "new favorites"!!

title: Review Stay 2/6/2022
text: The Lotte is well located in midtown close to museums and other tourist locations.  Staff were welcoming, professional and accommodating.  Room was large, clean and comfortable.  Vehicle parking is next door, and expensive approx $75/nite. Bar in the hotel is very cool, good bartender, NYC prices for drinks.  Breakfast in the Villard is overpriced, food is average, not worth the experience at the expensive price point. Overall well located hotel, safe, clean, comfortable, w/ accommodating staff.  Price point is NYC, and you do pay for the location.

title: Luxury as always
text: I always come here for a weekend staycation and I never regret it. I got a complimentary room upgrade which is always nice and the staff was friendly as well. Check-in/check-out was a breeze and as always, I will return

title: Hotel Concierge
text: Stayed here for 10 days and got a free upgrade to Cathedral view! Hotel guests service is excellent and friendly, especially Clara, she is warm and caring when I needed help looking for my Ubereats, she is willing to put in extra miles to help a customer, couldn’t ask for more!

title: Great hotel in a great location
text: Excellent hotel. Room was incredible and the team do everything they can to assist you in your stay. Being so close to the Rockefeller center it is an ideal location for tourists. Would definitely recommend.

title: Excellent
text:
This was our first time staying at The Palace and we are so glad we did, we enjoyed our stay to the fullest. The bed was confortable, our suite had a great view and the hotel was perfectly clean.
The cherry on top was the staff, everyone was very nice and welcoming. 
We are definitely coming back.

title: Best location- awesome staff!
text:
We tried several hotels years ago when our son started working in NYC. Fast forward  (over five years!) and we  will never stay anywhere else! 
Palace rooms are MUCH larger than other hotels and the cafe downstairs is really convenient- but the best thing about the Lotte Palace Towers is definitely their staff!
Jimm, Clara and Anna Marie made us feel like family!
Thank you for a wonderful trip! See you soon!

title: A great Winter Experience!
text:
The Lotte Palace Towers has always been my favorite place to stay in NYC! 
The staff is amazing!  The Front   Desk Manager, Miles Gomez,  goes out of his way to ensure a homecoming experience and always accommodating to every need a guest desires! Even under CDC guidelines, he makes your stay 5 star!
Of course Mike the Bellman  is another great staff member! He is friendly and warm to greet you as well as making you feel as though you are family!
No one ever forgets the robust personality of George the doorman! He actually carried me out of the car upon my arrival! Lol
Diego the Concierge is always communicating regarding plans he made for you during your stay! An experienced Concierge representative and certainly accommodating!
Carla is always there to assist with the minute details of providing things needed at the last minute! She even walks you to your door! Now that’s devotion!
I loved our recent stay this last trip! As cold as it was, the Lotte Palace was warm and inviting!
Thank you everyone for always making the long trip from Phoenix to NYC something to look forward to!

title: Concierge Service
text:
I recently had a remote experience with this wonderful Hotel's concierge staff and would like to say Thank you!
I called and asked if a rose can be left in my wife's room for her arrival this afternoon, I spoke with Ani, she was so pleasant and not only offered to facilitate this with procurement from a local florist, she even went and got the flower herself (Over and above!) and called me to say that the flower is in the room for her check in in the Beautiful Tower section of the hotel. I have stayed here at this beautiful hotel with my wife in the past and certainly will be back. Thank you Ani so very much for what you did for me, Top shelf!.

John W. Huhn

title: Great stay!
text: My wife and I stayed at the Towers this weekend as part of our daughters wedding at the Palace. Everything was terrific. The room, the staff, parking, check in and check out.  We had a suite and it was worth every penny.  The Palace did a terrific job on the wedding, but having our guests who stayed in the Tower be treated so well was a big bonus.  Also, for what it’s worth, this is consistent with every experience I have had at this hotel over the last several years.

title: Wedding of our dreams
text:
My husband and I got married here in mid-January and could not have asked for a better experience. Of course the setting was incredible - beautiful views out the hotel room windows, gorgeous ballrooms and event spaces for various parts of the wedding, and awesome food. The gym is also spectacular with tons of equipment and lots of space to social distance.

But what really made our experience top notch that sets the Palace apart from other places are the people. You can really feel the management at the palace when you interact with their staff. Specifically for our wedding, we coordinated with Adam and Peter. Both Adam and Peter helped orchestrate a seamless event, and also went above and beyond to make sure that me, my husband, and our families were all especially cared for. Additionally, Ani behind the desk is lovely and helpful, Jocelyn from housekeeping was amazing, all of the bellman were terrific helpers (thank you Omar) and so personable - if we could name everybody we would. We love this place and look forward to returning each year for our anniversary!

title: Spectacular View, Service Lacking
text:
Our Towers one-bedroom suite was gorgeous. A wall of windows offered breathtaking views of the cathedral and the ice rink and the room was spotless.  A large living room with dining table and desk, mood lighting, remote control shades, nice artwork and attractive furnishings all added to the comfort.  The toiletries and towels were luxurious and the large closet and second bathroom was an added bonus.  We couldn’t have been happier with the room for our several night stay.

Unfortunately, the rest of our experience didn’t live up to the room.  From the start, we were met with construction scaffolding instead of the stunning Christmas tree and holiday festivities described. The bellman tried three times to lead us away from the Towers check-in where we waited 15 minutes to be assisted (with only one person in front of me), only to be told our room wasn’t ready. My husband asked the female concierge to break a bill for gratuities for the bellmen and was rudely turned away.  They held our luggage, but when we returned later, one bag was missing. (It was found and brought to the room along with a bag containing a mini bottle of wine and candy.)   

There was no turn down service, (which was fine) but we returned late to discover there was no bedding on the sofa bed. We ordered room service breakfast, which took an hour and a half and was cold and had obviously been sitting for a while.  A waiter knocked to take away our dishes and cart as he said they were short, but we were allowed to keep our champagne and coffee since we hadn’t finished them yet. We left for the day and did not receive housekeeping service - beds unmade, no clean towels, and breakfast dishes were still on the table when we returned that night - even though we had turned on our request for service light. When we asked for taxis at the door, we were told several times to walk to the intersection - the bellman said cabs don’t like to turn down the side street due to bus lane restrictions. Towers personnel didn’t even bother to look up from their computers to say hello as we passed by several times a day. When you’re paying over $1000. per night for a room in a luxury hotel that boasts about unsurpassed service, these shortfalls felt unacceptable.  Perhaps it was because we had just come from the Willard Intercontinental Hotel in Washington, DC, where we experienced exceptional service and couldn’t help but compare.

We were patient and didn’t complain - writing it off to being short-staffed and Covid-related.  We still tipped generously, knowing this has been a rough couple of years for the service industry.  But I returned home to see stellar staff reviews from this same holiday period, so I’m baffled as to our frustrating treatment. This was supposed to be a special Christmas/Anniversary trip, but combined with our Broadway shows being cancelled due to the Covid surge, was disappointing all around. Again, great room and location, but doubt we would return due to the service.

title: Great assistance !
text:
Great attention from Mr Miles Gomez. At front desk. 
He help us with our needs of beds and accommodations, and move all our stuff to a new room and organized our items very well. He made our stay very comfortable and convenient. We feel very great ful

title: The palace of New York City!
text: The name says everything.  We stay in the Towers, and despite the COVID restrictions, the hotel goes the extra mile.  In my mind, the measure of a luxury hotel starts with the doormen and the bell staff, and The Palace has among the best in all our world travels.  George Kyriakides is an institution among New York doormen, and for good reason... he represents the best of old world graciousness.  Can't wait for the restaurants and the bars to fully re-open.

title: Old World charm, Incredible staff, Great location
text: Our family of four stayed in the Towers at the LOTTE Palace over the holidays. The atmosphere was warm & elegant with city views from the upper floors that are off the charts. The onsite team was attentive to details and delivered an incredible stay for us including delicious confections delivered to our room upon on arrival. Check out the spa for massages & facials after a long day of shopping. Find Maurice for a private Gossip Girl tour. Maurice is the heartbeat of the hotel and will keep you smiling with his stories of the rich & famous while he gives you a “behind-the-scenes” look at where the famous TV show was shot. The location is conveniently located near Rockefeller Center, 5th Avenue shopping & Central Park. Grab a lovely breakfast in the Gold Room before you hit the streets. We will be back soon!

title: Great service!
text: We stayed here for a NYE holiday and all the staffs were very friendly and helpful. Quality hotel and great services. Special shout out to Clara who went above and beyond to help us make our stay smooth and memorable. I would definitely come back here again.

title: Wonderful Christmas
text: We can’t say enough good things about our stay at the Lotte this Christmas. Fabulous views, awesome room, super clean, the hotel property is a amazing …… but what really made it special are all the staff, Nancy went out of her way to make sure we were comfortable, Miles, Ani, Diego and Eddie were so welcoming, in fact all the staff were fabulous. It was great to be able to dine in the gold room again so happy it was open. If you want a true luxury experience you have to stay at this hotel.

title: Amazing!!
text: Clara was so sweet and greeted us with our names everytime! So friendly! Thank you! 5 Stars! Service was great! She looked to add all the special touches. She was so welcoming each time we came and went!

title: A Wonderful Stay for the Holidays
text: My wife and I had a most pleasant stay at the Towers at New York Palace.  The service was excellent, the room was spacious and clean, and the hotel was decorated beautifully and tastefully for the Holiday season.  A special thank you to Samir who was so helpful in assisting us with printing out boarding passes when the lobby computer was having issues.

title: We loved our stay at Lotte!
text: We stayed at Lotte for 5 nights over Christmas and absolutely loved every minute of it!  I was a little worried about check in because I read that it took awhile. Not true!  We walked right up and we were in our room less than 10 minutes upon arriving. We requested a room refrigerator and it was delivered soon after. The bed is the only thing that was not 100%. It was a little too hard for my taste. While there, I visited the spa and received a very nice massage. I may never forget this stay. It was just that good!

title: Exceptional!
text: We’ve been fortunate enough to stay during the holiday season and have enjoyed every moment. The hotel is even more gorgeous than usual, the staff is friendly and accommodating, the location couldn’t be more convenient and the overall feel is luxurious without being stuffy. I’m specifically writing to commend the staff and assistant front office manager, Miles Gomez. Over the years, my daughter became convinced that the postcards provided by the Lotte are the only “official” letters to Santa. (Santa at the Lotte deserves his own praise. He is phenomenal!!) Well, when we weren’t able to make the trip this year, I called the hotel and explained my dilemma. They promptly mailed me copies of the postcard as well as some extra Christmas treats to go along with them.  I am blown away and so thankful for that level of care and customer service!   Well done!  I can’t wait to show my daughter that her “official” postcard arrived today. Thank you for being part of the magic!

title: Phenomenal stay!
text: We stayed at the Palace for a long weekend in December. The service was impeccable and you just can’t beat the magic of Christmas time in NYC. We had amazing views of the city including St Patrick’s and Rockefeller Plaza. Can’t wait to return next year!

title: Samir made it wonderful
text: The room was great, but what made it stand out the most was the kindness and helpfulness of Samir. Found us local restaurants, cabs, and directions whenever we needed it. I’d be glad to come back to the Towers and get assistance like that again.

title: A Lovely Stay
text: My friend and I enjoyed a lovely 4-night stay in the Towers.  Our room was huge, not just by NYC standards, and had a great view.  The hotel staff was, without exception, warm, personable, and helpful.  There were a couple of housekeeping glitches, but they were resolved quickly.  Food and drink prices were a bit shocking after not having been in NYC since before the pandemic began, but once one acclimates to that, this hotel is a great home base while visiting NYC.

title: Wonderful Christmas Visit
text: We had a fantastic to Lotte during this Christmas season. This hotel is so family friendly. Special thanks to Samir in the lobby. He bonded with my son over soccer and it was the highlight of his trip. Many special thanks to everyone working at this beautiful hotel. You really care and made us all feel very welcome and at home. Also, incredible bar.

title: The New York palace
text: Clara was outstanding very kind and always helpful. She always has a smile for everyone   We needed to ship things home, she got us a box and tape.  The hotel was clean.  The bell staff and the door man are extremely helpful and friendly

title: Lotte née your palace
text: Fantastic place to stay because of the location, the beautiful hotel , and the staff! The staff were all so friendly and would do anything to help you. George the bellman has worked here for 42 years, Samir was so nice and didn’t mind taking our photos on the famous stairwell.  Rooms were quiet and beautiful views. We will stay here again!

title: A home away from home
text: We have spent several extended stays at the hotel and have been treated every time as if we were the most important guests in the hotel. Everyone, from the managers to the desk clerks to the concierges, to the bellmen, to the folks in the cafe are simply wonderful and as helpful as can be.  I have always found it amazing that here, as in "Cheers," "Everybody knows your name."  This is the only hotel in which I have found this to be the case. This is truly a full service hotel and a veritable oasis in midtown NYC.

title: The best
text:
Excellent!!!! We had a wonderful stay with my daughter! The hotel staff went out of the way in helping us always. 
Rooms extra clean, daily house keeping, with fresh towels! 

Specially Clara from the front desk that provided my daughter with a secure internet connection and a quiet place to take her  final exam. Thank you Clara for being so attentive and thank you for the teddies as well.

title: Great place to stay
text:
We stayed for 3 nights and could not have chosen a better place to stay. 
Our trip was booked they Costco and they honored their request for upgrade based on availability, bonus!!
The rooms are really nice. Everything looked clean and very well maintained. They are also spacious and well lit. Plus the view of the skyline from our floor was spectacular.
We also loved the Molton Brown toiletries, so much we ordered some to use at home.
We ordered room service and we were impressed with the service, not so much with the food, but it was good anyway.
It’s a great place to stay if you are looking for a high-end hotel with everything you need to enjoy the city.

title: Classic and Elegant Hotel in Midtown
text: If you can afford it and want to experience the classic elegance of New York, you won’t be disappointed with The Palace.  Located in a perfect midtown location, it is walking to distance to everything in Midtown and easy access to Manhattan in general.

title: Worst hotel service ever!
text: From the moment we checked in this has been the worst hotel experience. The check in staff were rude and too busy on the phone to help me. After 2 days and asking multiple times we have yet to have our room made up. We waited 2 hours tor towels and almost missed our Broadway show. Never stay here!

title: Kal is the King of the tower
text:
I stayed with my wife during Thanksgiving, great hotel with an amazing location. I absolutely love New York City specifically Manhattan. This hotel was great and Kal was very accommodating and knowledge with what to do with our time in New York. He made our trip very special and we will return because of him. 

Nancy the front office manager is top notch. Between her professionalism and Kal’s Professionalism, this should be rated the number one hotel in the world. 

Thank you Kal and Nancy for making my stay so special.

title: The Best of everything
text: My daughter and I take an annual trip to Manhattan at Christmastime, and the Lotte New York Palace is our favorite hotel.  The hotel location is a perfect starting point for anywhere you want to venture out into the City. We arrived on Sunday and were greeted warmly, like old friends, by Samir. He made sure that our room was ready for check in (even though we were a little early) and gave us some lovely souvenirs. Alfred checked us in and the entire staff was amazing from the friendly doormen, housekeepers and room service staff to the awesome team in the lounge.  Our room was gorgeous and well stocked with luxury toiletries.  The bedding was so comfortable that we overslept 2 days in a row! The lemon mascarpone pancakes should not be missed for breakfast.  The Gold Room lounge has a great vibe and the cocktails were terrific. Have a 'Gossip Girl' cocktail if you dare!  I only wish we could stay longer.....until next time Lotte New York Palace, see you in 2022! XOXO Ms. Barry

title: vacation
text: Clara was very good We do appreciate her assistance.                                                         Clara was very helpfull  in locating places.    The hotel personal were very helpful aswell. WE will surely return. Want to see Thw 9 1 1 area 20 years past.

title: Subpar
text:
I booked a one bedroom corner suite at the Towers at the Lotte New York Palace recently. I was very excited as the reviews are all stellar. I hate to say I was very disappointed. 

When I arrived I was disappointed to find the “valet” was actually a public garage. I was late for a meeting and the hotel was no help. The line for the valet was out the door of the garage, spilling onto the street. I finally got the bellman to acknowledge me, and asked if I could run in, check in, and get back to my car to drive instead of walk the short distance because the valet was going to take far too long. The bellman rolled his eyes and told me “you have 5 minutes”. I rushed inside to find a line, and only one employee at the front desk. Needless to say, I ran out of time, and had to leave the hotel before I was able to check in as I was going to miss my meeting. 

I returned hours later, and was able to check in. When I went up to my room, I found the  room to be extremely dated. The room service menu, and the hotel restaurant menu, offered no vegan or gluten free options. The cable for the TV was actually fed through a coax cable. There was no way to utilize any modern streaming services. The bed was incredibly uncomfortable, I could feel the springs, and I felt like I was laying on too of a large drum. The shower was very outdated, and there was mold on the ceiling of the shower stall. The whole room felt like I had stepped into a time warp and landed in 1980. 

The whole experience was awful. I was in the city to celebrate my 40th birthday, and spend some time at my company’s offices. The time in New York was wonderful, and the view from the room was fantastic, but the overall hotel experience was subpar at best.

title: Truly exceptional
text:
The hotel surpassed our expectations.  It’s was beautifully decorated for Christmas (unfortunately their signature Christmas tree in the courtyard was not up this year, but the decor inside was lovely). We stayed in the Towers, with the most amazing view over the Cathedral and the city.  The perfect location, within walking distance of some of New York’s iconic sights and shops.
The rooms were spacious, as there was 4 adults in one room. No mini bar due to covid but bottles of water were delivered daily. 
The staff were so friendly and couldn’t do enough to help.  The Concierge Team, were amazing and gave us some fantastic recommendations for dinner.  We’ll definitely go back and couldn’t recommend this hotel enough.

title: Excellent Service!
text: The service from Clara was excellent. She was friendly, helpful and knowledgeable. She was nice and always remembered family! She made our family vacation enjoyable! The hotel was clean, spacious and had great views!

title: The service from Clara was superb!
text:
The service from Clara is awesome! So helpful and she remembered our name! Wow!      
She was knowledgeable, helpful, friendly and always willing to help! The hotel rooms were clean, spacious and great views.

title: Thanksgiving break.
text: Awesome and beautiful place! It had great service and great food. We did the Gossip Girl tour where the amazing guide Maurice took us around to the places they filmed. He was awesome and had some great stories. Great experience!

title: Creating Memories
text:
La última vez que nos hospedamos con ustedes fue en junio de 2020. Ya es tradición pasar nuestro aniversario de bodas con ustedes. Su atención y detalles son impecables. Esperamos volver en junio 2022 para nuestro aniversario 39.
Se you soon !!!

Cecile Flores
Mexico City

title: Mr
text:
I have been staying at The Lotte Palace for years. It has great rooms and a wonderful location.
The breakfat service has never been its strong point but now they have crowded everything into one room and are clearly understaffed . They require prrof of identity to get into breakfast which is a bit absurd.
I wish to pay a special compliment to Clara, one of the lobby staff members. I was tired from travelling waiting for my room at the check in desk which was short staffed. She approached me voluntarily in the kindest manner and helped me get my room. This kind of personal interest in the comfort of the guest you only find in the best hotels in the world . Congratulations for having her on your staff.

title: The Place to Stay
text: Everything about this hotel is fabulous, The rooms are opulently decorated and the views from the Tower are spectacular (my room looked down on Saint Patrick's Cathedral.)  And the housekeeping staff cleans your room every day (unlike many other hotels today who say: Because of COVID, we'll only clean your room if you beg us.)  And the little store on the 51st Street side is amazingly wil stocked.

title: Service Never Faltered
text: While the service level at other hotels has dipped since the start of the pandemic, I find the same excellent service at The Towers at Lotte New York Palace.  Jim Kalinka was especially gracious and willing to try to make accommodations that could meet our needs.  I have always been treated with respect and kindness.  Wonderful place to stay!

title: Best NYC Location!
text: Brought my family to celebrate a milestone birthday--everyone at the hotel went above and beyond to make our stay special.  First time back since the pandemic and I felt very safe in the hotel with all their precautions.  Kal, the concierge extraordinaire, secured wonderful tickets to Broadway and restaurants.  The manager Nancy also did a wonderful job making our stay memorable. Henry the bellman was quiet helpful and charming. The location with views of St. Patrick's Cathedral are the best in midtown. A quiet hotel one block from all the action! The people and the hotel are superior, that's the reason I keep coming back.

title: Best Birthday Ever!
text: My Mom and sister surprised me with a trip to New York for my 18th birthday and it was amazing. We had amazing service and everyone I met was so sweet. Our trip was made infinitely better by the manager, Nancy and Kal the concierge. He made absolute miracles happen and got us amazing broadway tickets to the musical Six. Henry the bellman was also so helpful & truly made our stay that much better. I cannot wait to return!

title: Vacation family visit
text:
As always we were/ are very happy with this hotel, the best place Manhattan where we have stayed for the last 30 years.
Personal attention the best in US hotels, make you feel at home. Mrs Clara as always gives a very special attention and makes us happy to come back.
Recommend the Tower view an size of the rooms/ suites

title: Exceptional hotel for meetings & events!
text: The Palace hotel is a truly incredible property to stay at but what really makes it stand out from a meeting & event perspective is the service levels and staff members. As an event planner, I have run a few meetings since COVID at various hotels around the US and all of them were struggling and had a noticeable lack of service levels. Not The Palace. The staff members were one of the best I have ever worked with and went above and beyond for us. They are seasoned professionals when it comes to managing events and became an extension of our team every step of the way to ensure a successful meeting. Our attendees came from around the US and all thoroughly enjoyed their experience here. It was great to see the city getting back to normal. I highly recommend this hotel for your next meeting or event. You are in great hands!

title: it's not the same New york palace hotes
text: The restaurant and bar opened next day of my arrival. Nobody informed so I had to keep going put for breakfast. Amenitites such as minibar and others are still not available. Same otherer areas are still closed.

title: I LOVE THE LOTTE NEW YORK PALACE!
text: This is one of the best hotels I have ever stayed at. Our room was beautiful. The service was amazing. Kal Naim, the concierge, went above and beyond. He helped arrange a cake for my sister’s birthday and help us plan our stay. This hotel is so well manage. Would recommend to all my friends. The manger, Nancy, has done an amazing job! Also the doormen were amazing and chatted with me for a long while. Also cool note, this hotel was featured in gossip girl!

title: Wonderful, safe, perfect🗽❤️
text: This is actually the first time I fly anywhere since Covid. Of course my choice had to be NYC. My son and I came to celebrate his bday and I needed some time off from work. Becky and Natsuko were amazing and so welcoming.  We stayed in a beautiful one bedroom suite overlooking St Patrick’s Cathedral and that view honestly takes your breath away.  The suite was extremely clean and extremely detailed. I felt so safe knowing that The Towers is following every single protocol for Covid. Everyone was wearing a mask the whole time. The hotel wasn’t busy and I loved the fact that staff and guests were following masks wear and social distancing in the elevators and around the whole hotel. Clara like always was perfect in every way. She anticipates our needs and is always ready to help in every way. Diego,( I don’t have words to thank you for your friendship and for everything you do for us.. we love you) Rene ( my amazing friend you are soooo amazing we love you), Ani ( your kindness amazes us.. we love you),Roxenne, Kal ( always so wonderful to us)and Jimmy. Miles you are such a great leader and friend. We love you so much. A more than special thank you to Samir who I know that I can count on when I am in distress. He is so calm, loyal, loving.  It was so great to see Olga, Teresa, George, Henri, Arlene, Veronica, Mark  from Pomme Palais and Carah from the Spa. Talking about the spa.. my son and I both had massages and it was perfect. The spa is spotless and again I felt very safe the whole time. Carah was very attentive and wonderful. Our trip was perfect! Again thank you Becky and the whole staff. We will be back soon.. If anyone is looking for a perfect place to stay, choose The Towers  for the location, exclusivity, service, cleanliness and safety.

title: Great place to stay
text:
Well, where do I start? hotel is a MUST if you are visiting the city. Jimm at check in is amazing , helped us with everything, and made our stay amazing . We loved the suite  and we are planing to come back.
Thank you Jimm

title: Wow just Wow!
text: The towers at the palace is just the absolute best place to stay in the city.  My favorite part is the check in.  Everyone is so friendly.  If you are lucky enough to get Jimm your experience will be the best ever.  He is so friendly and super accommodating.  STAY THERE you wont regret it.

title: Amazing  birthday celebration and family vacation
text:
The Towers at the Lotte NY Palace  is the ultimate Manhattan hotel! Jimm at the front desk was amazing and treated us like VIPs from beginning to the end of our trip. Matt is an icon as bell captain and knocked himself out for us, as always.
The hotel offers the best location and amenities and is our go to every time we are in NYC. It never disappoints!
We celebrated there most recently with 3 generations of our family and everyone agreed the hotel was perfect. 
We are already booked next month for another long weekend and cannot wait!

title: Great hotel
text: Our corner suite was spacious and nicely appointed. Staff was great. Ladies loved the spa. The location was convenient. I didn’t remember it from living in the City 20 years ago but they told me the hotel was 40 years old. It must have had a recent renovation because everything seemed new.

title: This was my second time staying at The Towers at Lotte New York Palace, and it was fabulous!
text: Clara has been so gracious and helpful both times that I have stayed at the hotel. Cecilia who was our housekeeper was wonderful.  She made sure we had everything we needed in our room/suite. Each and every one of the doormen offer a smile and exceptional help obtaining a ride anywhere I needed to go!  I traveled with a friend who frequently stays at the Lotte New York Palace every time she travels to New York.  They remember her, they welcome her, her family and/or business entourage with open arms.  I was so impressed by this.  The hotel staff offer nothing but the upmost professional service.  I will be traveling back to New York City very soon and look forward to staying at The Towers at Lotte New York Palace once again.  A 5 star rating is well deserved!

title: Best guest services I have ever experienced (especially from Clara and Henry).
text:
While it’s rare I leave any type of review, I feel it’s nessicary to give this hotel and their employees a 5 star review. I am often traveling the world staying in 5 start hotels. During these times i have been accustomed to receiving excellent hotel service as a guest. Upon arrival  and throughout my stay the hotel staff went above and beyond to esnure all my needs were met during my stay. More specifically Clara and Henry were so courteous and attentive during our stay. They are the main reasons while I will being staying in the towers more often! 
We look forward to visiting again soon.

title: Great time at the towers of New York Palce
text:
Great luxurious hotel.  After 2 years not being in NY I felt like coming home. 
We came ahead of schedule and a young assistant front manager by the name of Nancy went out of her way to enable us to get the room (after 12 hours flight) she was polite and very efficient. 

All the staff makes you feel as you are a VIP. 

In a nut shell if you want to stay in great hotel in the centre on NY close to everything, this should be you hotel.

title: Service At Its Best
text: For years, I have stayed exclusively at The Towers at Lotte New York Palace. While the location is perfect and the property is excellent, the real reason is the personal service provided by all the staff. During my most recent visit, I was greeted with familiar faces and upgraded to a room in the The Towers overlooking St. Patrick's Cathedral. It never ceases to amaze me that the staff knows me by name and takes the time to ask how I'm doing. One person in particular, Miles Gomez, has always and continues to exceed expectations. His unparalleled service is a true testament to the hotel and overall experience of my stays. I strongly recommend the hotel.

title: CEO
text:
Clara provide excellent service with a smile behind her mask!!!

We like the location because it is centrally located in Manhattan. We always get the cathedral corner room now known as the junior suite. The amenities are what we always look for in a fine hotel
We have been a guest for many years and will continue to return to see Clara all right Claire thank you

title: Simply The Best!
text: The title says it all. My mom travels to NYC several times a year, and we have been staying at the towers for more than 6 years now. From the first day we stepped onto the property, we were impressed with everything....which is very difficult to do. Our hotel liaison Jimm Kalinka provides 5 star treatment and makes us feel like we are home. He always greets us with a friendly face, and shares hot tips on the latest restaurants and shopping destinations. Our stay would not be the same without him. After covid we were not sure about staying in the city,  but the Towers has everything covered. I can 100% say it is safe to stay here, everything is clean, sanitized, and they will listen and accommodate any request or concern you may have. The hotel itself is stunning, and with the holidays coming up, there is no better experience, than to stay at the Palace, which is within walking distance to the Tree, Radio City, St. Patricks, and Saks. I would live here if I could!!

title: The best hotel with the best service in NYC!!
text: We haven't been back to the city in a while because of Covid, but my family and I decided to finally head back and have some fun! We stayed at the Towers, and all I can say is wow! This hotel is probably the nicest one I have ever stayed at. We like to stay primarily in Midtown, so the location was perfect. On top of the grand lobby and absolutely beautiful room we had, the service was top notch. We were helped by Jimm at check in, and he made sure that we had all of our questions answered and also gave us wonderful recommendations for new and fun things to do in the city. Having someone so nice and helpful definitely makes a huge difference in my mind. We had an absolute blast in the city, and we will definitely be staying at The Towers again!

title: Great stay!
text: The Tower at Lotte Palace is our go-to! The rooms are super comfortable with amazing views. It is the best, convenient location in NYC! Kal the concierge is fabulous and helped us with great theatre tickets and wonderful restaurants. Will be back!

title: Maurice IS the PALACE
text:
Of course the property is fabulous. Many areas closed because of COVID . I don’t understand why the outside garden area is closed.  They did not have to offer service there but please let guest bring their  coffee in the morning or wine at night.  It doesn’t make sense to not utilize outdoor areas.
We were fortunate enough to to have a private tour with Maurice this trip. THE STORIES , the history the tour… HE is an amazing wealth of knowledge . He is an asset to this property especially in a time when the average employee has know idea how to greet guest let alone have an interesting story about the property.

title: wonderful stay
text: very impressive experience! we slept really well during our stay, didn't hear any outside sound of the city. we got breathtaking views from the window. the hotel is also in a very convenient location!

title: A Fabulous Trip to NYC
text: This was my first stay at Lotte New York Palace and I will most definitely go back. The customer service was AMAZING! I never walked in or out of the hotel without one of the bellmen greeting me and asking if there was anything they could do for me. I was a little disappointed that the restaurant had not re-opened, but the coffee shop at the hotel was open, as was room service. If you're looking for a midtown hotel that's near everything, affordable and offers first-class customer service, give the Lotte a try.

title: Wedding weekend
text: We stayed at the Lotte New York Palace Hotel during our wedding weekend. We both had the corner tower suites and the rooms were awesome and huge. We both had huge bridal parties and it was so comfortable. Tiffany, who we were working with, was a dream! They are so accommodating and prior to our arrival, she asked if we had any requests and ensured that everything was taken care of and that we were comfortable. The hotel itself is gorgeous and is a New York staple. Being from NYC originally, I never actually stayed there but now, I can’t wait for my next stay there. Highly recommend!

title: Cannot wait to return!
text: Jim at the Towers front desk and Matthew, bell captain, are the best you will find. They truly want your stay to be a wonderful experience and go the extra mile to make it special. We feel like family at The Palace and cannot wait for our next trip.

title: Perfect Stay at The Palace!
text: I was impressed with the many friendly and helpful staff members who insured that my stay was wonderful and memorable.  Kudos to Lincy, Raymond, Clara, Tom, Gary, and the very polite Security Team Member (name began with a C, I think), who graciously let me into my room on 10/13 when I had forgotten to take my key, and felt like a knucklehead.  Incomparable Service from ALL!

title: A Jewel in Midtown
text:
Doormen were very kind and courteous.  Even covered us with umbrellas from car to hotel in the rain. The bellman was helpful and prompt.  Housekeeping kept our room immaculate.  We felt very safe in our space during this Covid time.  The suite was awesome.  Had a 53th floor view of St Patricks.  No street noise whatsoever.  It was nice having a full bath and a 1/2 bath for our daughter.  Plenty of room. The spa(newly opened only a few  weeks) was wonderful.  My wife and daughter enjoyed glorious facials and I had a massage that was sooooo relaxing.  The locker rooms abounded with amenities  and very safe/clean.  The hotel, right on Madison Ave is in upper midtown a few blocks from Central Park and in the center of the upscale shopping district.  This was an excellent location.  Of course, Uber can get you anywhere from there and they were literally poised only 3 min away.  The whole experience was upscale.  Oh yes,  there was  a complete and readily available by txt "valet" who was a real person who responded promptly to your questions and needs.  This ,for me was new and well worth having.
The only deficit was that the restaurant was not open and in house dining was lacking.  But, I was told this was in the process of re-evolving as the Covid issue begins to diminish.  Will need to plan to dine elsewhere for now though.  In general this was a great experience that you shouldn't miss.  We'll be back for sure!

title: Larsen / Bailey Wedding
text: Spectacular Wedding Venue! Everyone and everything was perfectly orchestrated. Peter Sofides, Director of Meetings and Events and his team made sure that the Wedding Weekend for the Bride & Groom and the entire entourage came together flawlessly. We couldn’t be happier with the choice of venue or with the entire team at The New York Palace. It was a Dream Wedding Weekend!

title: superbly helpful and friends staff
text:
Large gracious room with two king beds, loaded with luxurious linens.  A stunning view.  The housecleaners went above and beyond, tidying as well as cleaning.  We were rushing in and out all the time because of a wedding we were attending and whenever we came back "home" it looked fresh and ready for us.
I would like to mention Clara at first floor reception as particularly helpful, getting the elevator for me when my hands were full, keeping my husband company in his wheelchair while we waited for our car or a taxi.

title: Gossip girl tour!
text: Maurice was sweet enough to give us a tour of the hotel, showing us all the iconic gossip girl sites AND taking great pictures of us along the way. It’s definitely not part of his job description (he’s the only security guard who gives the tour) but he patiently takes time out of his day for those that ask. He is the absolute best and made us feel so special!! It was definitely one of the highlights of our vacation. 😊

title: Wonderful service from Maurice!
text: Enjoyed my time at the palace, and was so impressed with the exclusive tour from Maurice! He was knowledgeable about all of the gossip girl filming spots and so kind to take photos at each great spot! He’s a gem!

title: Awesome, fabulous and wonderful Hotel experience!
text: The Towers has ambiance and the staff exceptional! The rooms are exquisite! I love the location and can walk to most of my favorite places! I have been staying here for years and never had a bad experience! I love the Cathedral  View and feel special to be treated to an upgrade when available! Thanks to Miles, Clara, Isabella, Diego, Xion, and George the Greek Doorman, Mike and Fran, My NYC family of dedicated servants..I’ll be back!

title: The Elegance of the Lotte New York Palace
text: This hotel is exceptional in every way. The history and architecture of the building is magnificant and breathtaking.  From the moment we entered the hotel, the staff was professional yet friendly and charming. Every need was met and the location is sheer perfection. The tour given by Maurice was an undeniable highlight to the trip. The Lotte NY Palace is the definition of understated elegance and luxury.

title: Reconnecting at the Lotte New York Palace in NYC
text: My best friend of over 50 years and I got to see each other again in NYC for the US Open. Once again, we stayed at the Lotte New York Palace. Our stay started off a little rough and I understand that everything is not back to normal - for example - the courtyard, which we love,  is not yet open. We initially had a difficult time getting into our room but, thank you so much to Jimm and Nancy who made everything perfect. They stayed on top of things until they got us into a fabulous room. Thanks to both.

title: Way better than the Park Plaza!
text:
Everything about this hotel is phenomenal!  We loved the brand new spa - with aroma showers! Top of the line beds, complete with warmers. The massages we received really helped alleviate all our sore spots from walking so much. The gym is one of the best we have seen at any hotel. It even had a Peloton bike and a gorgeous view, lots of mirrors, top of the line machines, free weights, TRX suspension training equipment, and more - in a room filled with diffusers! 
The service is beyond exceptional. The staff are genuinely attentive and go the extra mile. Special thanks goes to Ani Bedrossian for all her knowledge and wisdom for everything in and around the city. All her recommendations were excellent!  She even guided us to the best COVID testing site for flying. It was quick and free and results were received incredibly fast!  Charles and Raymond were equally great- always greeting us by name and making sure they got the door for us each and every time. We must also mention marvelous Michael at the front desk, caring Clara, and our lovely housekeeper - Gifty. And then there is Anand, at the spa, who passionately shared his deep knowledge of the spa and gym. It is evident the staff are happy about the place where they work. 
This hotel is perfectly located at the center of it all. We stayed one night at the Park Plaza and did not receive anywhere close to the same level of service as he have at the Lotte New York Palace. Kudos to management for a well run hotel.

title: Great experiene
text: The Hotel is great, but best of all, Clara at the front desk. Clara really exceeded our expectations. She was vey kind and helped us when we asked for a room with a better bathroom. She took care of every detail so our experience was amazing. Thank you very much, Clara!

title: Wedding Festivities at Palace
text: If you are looking for a wedding, rehearsal, brunch, or event space, look no further.  Peter, the director of events, is phenomenal and an absolute pleasure to work with.  I got ready for my wedding and hosted a post wedding brunch open to all wedding guests at the palace.  Peter greeted my husband and I at 1 am and helped us store all of our essentials for brunch the next day.  He made everything so easy and his team set up a beautiful brunch that guests are still raving about. The front desk was also a pleasure - shout out to Miles for making my stay so wonderful.  Couldn't recommend the palace more - my husband and i are already discussing what event we would like to host there next :)

title: Gemmell Wedding at The Palace
text:
Well,  where do I start?  We had a long day flying from Toronto as per all the Covid precautions. As soon  as we arrived atThe Lotte Palace we were greeted by a staff of warm and friendly people who are employed there.  One person who was EXCEPTIONAL with his service he provided to us was Maurice.  This gentleman went above and beyond his duties to make sure our stay was memorable.   I won't list everything he helped us with but I will suggest if you are staying here please seek him out.  Your stay will be happier and definitely more interesting  Thank you Mauruce for all your knowledge. 

The wedding itself was FANTASTIC.  We went to events Friday, Saturday and Sunday hosted by the hotel.  I can't even describe how amazing the food was but it was the best lamb, meat and fish I've tasted.  The decor was very elegant.  Please check this hotel out for your event.  Ask for Rachael.  She made sure things went very smoothly and seamless.  

The rooms were comfortable.  The most memorable thing about our room was Jennifer.  She came everyday to clean and made sure we had all the toiletries we needed.  She was a welcomed voice to see in the halls to say good morning to.   Always with a smile she sure put a positive start to the day.  Thank you Jennifer!

From check in to check out all our needs were met with kindness, compassion and enthusiasm.   Great job staff of The Palace.   Thank you for a memorable stay at your hotel and a lasting  impression of what a great city New York really is.

This truly is a first class hotel.

title: My experience staying at the Lotte New York Palace
text: This hotel is a MUST if you are visiting the city. The attention and kindness of it's staff is surreal. Also, if you are fana of Gossip Girl you have to ask for Maurice, a kind gentleman who will tour you around the hotel showing you where they filmed every specific scene! He makes the tour a one in a lifetime experience!! Thank u so much Maurice and Lotte staff!

title: Won’t find anything better
text: The hotel was absolutely spectacular, the amenities and everything! We have our highlights tho! Maurice was an absolute sunshine, he’s the gossip girl tour guide! And we agreed no one can do better than him since he was actually in the filming of the series!! Thank you Maurice! And thank you The Palace!

title: Service excellence and hospitality A++
text: Our NYC home away from home. World class service consistently and their entire team goes above and beyond to make you feel welcomed and right at home. A very special shout out to Mr. Rene, Samir and Mr. Jerry for making our family feel very special.

title: Birthday visit to daughter Elaina who worked here for 2 years before lockdown.
text: Beautiful room, bathroom gifts nice. Clara was courteous welcoming us. The temperature in room was a bit too cold. Took time to warm up. One lamp by bedside runs off by unscrewing it. Replace batteries in ha d held control for TV

title: Love this place
text: My family and I had an incredible 2 night stay at the Towers! The Towers staff were all very helpful and professional. Special thanks to Kal made sure to draw a smile on his face every time we ran into him! I would highly recommend staying here- felt wonderful coming back to the towers after a day of touring.

title: The Lotte Hotel
text: Very good service right away, help is everywhere not to mention friendly. The location is close to many breakfast diners. Also the subway to get all around the city. The rooms are luxurious and clean a clean feel. My favorite part was the and fitness center.

title: Amazing Stay in NYC
text: What an amazing stay, thanks to Miles and the rest of the Lotte team. I cannot say enough great things- perfect location, luxury accommodations, friendly team! It will be my only place to stay in NYC!

title: So Happy to be Back at the Towers at the New York Palace
text:
My husband and I stayed at the Towers for our 39th wedding anniversary. 
We have stayed at the Towers for the last 13 years.
We keep coming back as it is a beautiful hotel with breathtaking views and a wonderful and caring staff.
On that note it was sad not to be welcomed by Susan at the front desk of the Towers.
She was such a ray of sunshine and we missed her beautiful smile.
Our room was amazing with a spectacular view but we missed the personal touches that are usually there to welcome us for our anniversary.
We understand that COVID-19 protocol may have made this impossible.
The Towers will always be our number one choice and we had a wonderful time!
Thanks to the staff for making us feel safe after our first post COVID-19 stay.

title: Absolutely Wonderful
text: 🎂Happy Birthday to Me in NYC! Maurice made this Gossip Girl fan’s birthday wish come true with a surprise “Secret Tour” of filming spots. He was an awesome photographer taking pics of me & my family in the process🤗 Both Maurice and Kevin were on point with absolutely wonderful care of this “Gossip Girl” fan who just happened to be walking around on her last day in the city.

title: Amazing!
text: I am the biggest Gossip Girl fan and when I went to New York, I was determined to find all of the special spots where the show was filmed.
